GP12vipce_pu:4570: apaśyat sa ca maitreya ātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param // ViP_2,13.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:4572: sarvabhūtāny abhedena dadarśa sa mahāmatiḥ // ViP_2,13.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:4574: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca // ViP_2,13.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:4578: klinnadantāntaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ // ViP_2,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:4579: saṃmānanā parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4580: janenāvamato yogī yogasiddhiṃ ca vindati // ViP_2,13.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:4581: tasmāc careta vai yogī satāṃ dharmam adūṣayan /
GP12vipce_pu:4582: janā yathāvamanyeran gaccheyur naiva saṃgatim // ViP_2,13.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:4584: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa jaḍonmattākṛtiṃ jane // ViP_2,13.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:4586: yad yad āpnoti subahu tad atte kālasaṃyamam // ViP_2,13.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:4596: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mahākālī jñātvā yogeśvaraṃ tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4597: tataḥ khaḍgaṃ samādāya niśitaṃ niśi sā tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4601: viṣṭikartātha taṃ tatra viṣṭiyogyo 'yam ity api // ViP_2,13.48*12:8
GP12vipce_pu:4603: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatir dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4605: śreyaḥ kim atra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇām iti /
GP12vipce_pu:4606: praṣṭuṃ taṃ mokṣadharmajñaṃ kapilākhyaṃ mahāmunim // ViP_2,13.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:4608: nṛṇāṃ viṣṭigṛhītānām anyeṣāṃ so 'pi madhyagaḥ // ViP_2,13.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:4610: jātismaro 'sau pāpasya kṣayakāma uvāha tām // ViP_2,13.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:4612: kurvan matimatāṃ śreṣṭhas te tv anye tvaritaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_2,13.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:4614: kim etad ity āha samaṃ gamyatāṃ śibikāvahāḥ // ViP_2,13.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:4615: punas tathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan /
GP12vipce_pu:4616: nṛpaḥ kim etad ity āha bhavadbhir gamyate 'nyathā // ViP_2,13.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:4617: bhūpater vadatas tasya śrutvetthaṃ bahuśo vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4618: śibikodvāhakāḥ procur ayaṃ yātīty asatvaram // ViP_2,13.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:4620: kiṃ śrānto 'sy alpam adhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śibikā mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4621: kim āyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvān asi nirīkṣyase // ViP_2,13.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:4623: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4624: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāsaḥ soḍhavyo 'sti mahīpate // ViP_2,13.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:4626: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyase pīvān adyāpi śibikā tvayi /
GP12vipce_pu:4627: śramaś ca bhārodvahane bhavaty eva hi dehinām // ViP_2,13.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:4629: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yad dṛṣṭaṃ mama tad vada /
GP12vipce_pu:4630: balavān abalaś ceti vācyaṃ paścād viśeṣaṇam // ViP_2,13.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:4631: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayy adyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4632: mithyaitad atra tu bhavāñ śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // ViP_2,13.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:4636: skandhāśriteyaṃ śibikā mama bhāro 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,13.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:4638: tatra tvam aham apy atra procyate cedam anyathā // ViP_2,13.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:4639: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtair uhyāma pārthiva /
GP12vipce_pu:4641: karmavaśyā guṇā hy ete sattvādyāḥ pṛthivīpate /
GP12vipce_pu:4642: avidyāsaṃcitaṃ karma tac cāśeṣeṣu jantuṣu // ViP_2,13.66 //
GP12vipce_pu:4643: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4645: yadā nopacayas tasya na caivāpacayo nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4646: tadā pīvān asītītthaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // ViP_2,13.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:4648: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samas tvayā // ViP_2,13.69 //
GP12vipce_pu:4649: tathānyair jantubhir bhūpa śibikottho na kevalam /
GP12vipce_pu:4651: yadā puṃsaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prākṛtaiḥ kāraṇair nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4652: voḍhavyas tu tadā bhāraḥ katamo nṛpate mayā // ViP_2,13.71 //
GP12vipce_pu:4656: evam uktvābhavan maunī sa vahañ chibikāṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4657: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // ViP_2,13.73 //
GP12vipce_pu:4659: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4660: kathyatāṃ ko bhavān atra jālmarūpadharaḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,13.74 //
GP12vipce_pu:4661: yo bhavān yan nimittaṃ vā yad āgamanakāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4662: tat sarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvan mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // ViP_2,13.75 //
GP12vipce_pu:4664: śrūyatāṃ ko 'ham ity etad vaktuṃ bhūpa na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4667: dharmādharmodbhavau bhoktuṃ jantur dehādim ṛcchati // ViP_2,13.77 //
GP12vipce_pu:4668: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4669: dharmādharmau yatas tasmāt kāraṇaṃ pṛcchyate kutaḥ // ViP_2,13.78 //
GP12vipce_pu:4673: yat tv etad bhavatā proktaṃ ko 'ham ity etad ātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4674: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tan mamecchā pravartate // ViP_2,13.80 //
GP12vipce_pu:4675: yo 'sti so 'ham iti brahman kathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4676: ātmany eva na doṣāya śabdo 'ham iti yo dvija // ViP_2,13.81 //
GP12vipce_pu:4678: śabdo 'ham iti doṣāya nātmany eṣa tathaiva tat /
GP12vipce_pu:4679: anātmany ātmavijñānaṃ śabdo vā bhrāntilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,13.82 //
GP12vipce_pu:4680: jihvā bravīty aham iti dantauṣṭhau tālukaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4681: ete nāhaṃ yataḥ sarve vāṅniṣpādanahetavaḥ // ViP_2,13.83 //
GP12vipce_pu:4682: kiṃ hetubhir vadaty eṣā vāg evāham iti svayam /
GP12vipce_pu:4683: tathāpi vāṅ nāham etad vaktum itthaṃ na yujyate // ViP_2,13.84 //
GP12vipce_pu:4685: tato 'ham iti kutraitāṃ saṃjñāṃ rājan karomy aham // ViP_2,13.85 //
GP12vipce_pu:4686: yady anyo 'sti paraḥ ko 'pi mattaḥ pārthivasattama /
GP12vipce_pu:4687: tadaiṣo 'ham ayaṃ cānyo vaktum evam apīṣyate // ViP_2,13.86 //
GP12vipce_pu:4689: tadā hi ko bhavān ko 'ham ity etad viphalaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_2,13.87 //
GP12vipce_pu:4690: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyam vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥsarāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4691: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sad etan nṛpocyate // ViP_2,13.88 //
GP12vipce_pu:4692: vṛkṣād dāru tataś ceyaṃ śibikā tvadadhiṣṭhitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4693: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā yātā syād dārusaṃjñātha vā nṛpa // ViP_2,13.89 //
GP12vipce_pu:4694: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4695: na ca dāruṇi sarvas tvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // ViP_2,13.90 //
GP12vipce_pu:4697: anviṣyatāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha tadbhede śibikā tvayā // ViP_2,13.91 //
GP12vipce_pu:4699: kva yātaṃ chatram ity eṣa nyāyas tvayi tathā mayi // ViP_2,13.92 //
GP12vipce_pu:4700: pumān strī gaur ayaṃ vājī kuñjaro vihagas taruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4702: pumān na devo na naro na paśur na ca pādapaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4704: vastu rājeti yal loke yac ca rājabhaṭātmakam /
GP12vipce_pu:4705: tathānyac ca nṛpetthaṃ tan na satsaṃkalpanāmayam // ViP_2,13.95 //
GP12vipce_pu:4706: yat tu kālāntareṇāpi nānyasaṃjñām upaiti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4707: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tad vastu nṛpa tac ca kim // ViP_2,13.96 //
GP12vipce_pu:4708: tvaṃ rājā sarvalokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4709: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kaṃ tvāṃ bhūpa vadāmy aham // ViP_2,13.97 //
GP12vipce_pu:4710: tvaṃ kim etac chiraḥ kiṃ nu śiras tava tathodaram /
GP12vipce_pu:4711: kim u pādādikaṃ tvaṃ vai tavaitat kiṃ mahīpate // ViP_2,13.98 //
GP12vipce_pu:4713: ko 'ham ity eva nipuṇo bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // ViP_2,13.99 //
GP12vipce_pu:4714: evaṃ vyavasthite tattve mayāham iti bhāṣitum /
GP12vipce_pu:4719: praśrayāvanato bhūtvā tam āha nṛpatir dvijam // ViP_2,14.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4724: bhagavan yat tvayā proktaṃ paramārthamayaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4725: śrute tasmin bhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // ViP_2,14.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4727: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tat paraṃ prakṛter mahat // ViP_2,14.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4728: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā na mayi sthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4729: śarīram anyad asmatto yeneyaṃ śibikā dhṛtā // ViP_2,14.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4731: pravartante guṇāś caite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // ViP_2,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4733: mano vihvalatām eti paramārthārthitāṃ gatam // ViP_2,14.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4734: pūrvam eva mahābhāgaṃ kapilarṣim ahaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4735: praṣṭum abhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kiṃ nv ity asaṃśayam // ViP_2,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4736: tadantare ca bhavatā yad idaṃ vākyam īritam /
GP12vipce_pu:4737: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // ViP_2,14.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4740: sa eva bhagavān nūnam asmākaṃ hitakāmyayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4741: pratyakṣatām atra gato yathaitad bhavatocyate // ViP_2,14.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4742: tan mahyaṃ praṇatāya tvaṃ yac chreyaḥ paramaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4745: bhūpa pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthaṃ nu pṛcchasi /
GP12vipce_pu:4746: śreyāṃsy aparamārthāni aśeṣāṇy eva bhūpate // ViP_2,14.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4748: putrān icchati rājyaṃ ca śreyas tatprāptilakṣaṇam // ViP_2,14.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4750: śreyaḥ pradhānaṃ ca phale tad evānabhisaṃhite // ViP_2,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4751: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktais tathā param /
GP12vipce_pu:4752: śreyas tasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4754: santy atra paramārthās tu na tv ete śrūyatāṃ ca me // ViP_2,14.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4755: dharmāya tyajyate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4756: vyayaś ca kriyate kasmāt kāmaprāptyupalakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,14.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4757: putraś cet paramārthākhyaḥ so 'py anyasya nareśvara /
GP12vipce_pu:4758: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi tatpitā // ViP_2,14.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4759: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagaty asmiṃś carācare /
GP12vipce_pu:4760: paramārtho hi kāryāṇi kāraṇānām aśeṣataḥ // ViP_2,14.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4762: paramārthā bhavanty atra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ // ViP_2,14.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4764: paramārthabhūtaṃ tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ gadato mama // ViP_2,14.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4765: yat tu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4766: tat kāraṇānugamanāj jñāyate nṛpa mṛṇmayam // ViP_2,14.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4768: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī // ViP_2,14.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4770: tat tu nāśi na saṃdeho nāśidravyopapāditam // ViP_2,14.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4771: tad evāphaladaṃ karma paramārtho matas tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4774: bhedakāri parebhyas tat paramārtho na bhedavān // ViP_2,14.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4776: mithyaitad anyadravyaṃ hi naiti taddravyatāṃ yataḥ // ViP_2,14.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4777: tasmāc chreyāṃsy aśeṣāṇi nṛpaitāni na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4778: paramārthas tu bhūpāla saṃkṣepāc chrūyatāṃ mama // ViP_2,14.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:4779: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4782: na yogavān na yukto 'bhūn naiva pārthiva yokṣyati // ViP_2,14.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4786: abhedavyāpino vāyos tathā tasya mahātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4788: devādibhede 'padhvaste nāsty evāvaraṇo hi saḥ // ViP_2,14.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4791: ity ukte mauninaṃ bhūyaś cintayānaṃ mahīpatim /
GP12vipce_pu:4794: śrūyatāṃ nṛpaśārdūla yad gītam ṛbhuṇā purā /
GP12vipce_pu:4799: pramāṇatarkataḥ samyak māne meye 'pi niścite // ViP_2,15.3*14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4801: prādād aśeṣavijñānaṃ sa tasmai parayā mudā // ViP_2,15.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4803: sa ṛbhus tarkayām āsa nidāghasya nareśvara // ViP_2,15.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4804: devikāyās taṭe vīranagaraṃ nāma vai puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4805: samṛddham atiramyaṃ ca pulastyena niveśitam // ViP_2,15.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4807: nidāgho nāma yogajña ṛbhuśiṣyo 'vasat purā // ViP_2,15.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4808: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tat puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4809: jagāma sa ṛbhuḥ śiṣyaṃ nidāgham avalokitum // ViP_2,15.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4813: uvāca sa dvijaśreṣṭho bhujyatām iti sādaram // ViP_2,15.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4815: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yad annaṃ bhavato gṛhe /
GP12vipce_pu:4816: tat kathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama // ViP_2,15.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4819: yad rocate dvijaśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva yathecchayā // ViP_2,15.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4821: kadannāni dvijaitāni miṣṭam annaṃ prayaccha me /
GP12vipce_pu:4824: he he śālini madgehe yat kiṃcid atiśobhanam /
GP12vipce_pu:4827: ity uktā tena sā patnī miṣṭam annaṃ dvijasya yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4828: prasādhitavatī tad vai bhartur vacanagauravāt // ViP_2,15.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4829: taṃ bhuktavantam icchāto miṣṭam annaṃ mahāmunim /
GP12vipce_pu:4830: nidāghaḥ prāha bhūpāla praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,15.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4832: api te paramā tṛptir utpannā tuṣṭir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4833: api te mānasaṃ svastham āhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija // ViP_2,15.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4834: kvanivāso bhavān vipra kva ca gantuṃ samudyataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4835: āgamyate ca bhavatā yatas tac ca dvijocyatām // ViP_2,15.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4837: kṣud yasya tasya bhukte 'nne tṛptir brāhmaṇa jāyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4838: na me kṣud abhavat tṛptiṃ kasmān māṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,15.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4840: bhavaty ambhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇāṃ tṛḍ api jāyate // ViP_2,15.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4841: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4842: tataḥ kṣutsaṃbhavābhāvāt tṛptir asty eva me sadā // ViP_2,15.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4843: manasaḥ svasthatā tuṣṭiś cittadharmāv imau dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4844: cetaso yasya tat pṛccha pumān ebhir na yujyate // ViP_2,15.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4845: kva nivāsas tavety uktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yat tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4846: kutaś cāgamyate tatra tritaye 'pi nibodha me // ViP_2,15.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4847: pumān sarvagato vyāpī ākāśavad ayaṃ yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4848: kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsīty etad apy arthavat katham // ViP_2,15.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4850: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ ca nānye naivāham apy aham // ViP_2,15.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:4851: mṛṣṭaṃ na mṛṣṭam ity eṣā jijñāsā me kṛtā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4852: kiṃ vakṣyatīti tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ dvijasattama // ViP_2,15.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4853: kim asvādv atha vā mṛṣṭaṃ bhuñjato 'nnaṃ dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:4854: mṛṣṭam eva yadāmṛṣṭaṃ tad evodvegakāraṇam // ViP_2,15.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4855: amṛṣṭaṃ jāyate mṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭād udvijate janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4857: mṛṇmayaṃ hi gṛhaṃ yadvan mṛdā liptaṃ sthiraṃ bhavet /
GP12vipce_pu:4858: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // ViP_2,15.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:4860: ālipta āpyāyayataḥ puṃso bhogo 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,15.29*15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4862: guḍaṃ phalādīni tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // ViP_2,15.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4863: tad etad bhavatā jñātvā mṛṣṭāmṛṣṭavicāri yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4864: tan manaḥ samatālambi kāryaṃ sāmyaṃ hi muktaye // ViP_2,15.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4866: ity ākarṇya vacas tasya paramārthāśritaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4867: praṇipatya mahābhāgo nidāgho vākyam abravīt // ViP_2,15.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4868: prasīda maddhitārthāya kathyatāṃ yas tvam āgataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4869: naṣṭo mohas tavākarṇya vacāṃsy etāni me dvija // ViP_2,15.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4871: ṛbhur asmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4873: evam ekam idaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:4877: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā icchātaḥ prayayāv ṛbhuḥ // ViP_2,15.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4881: nidāghajñānadānāya tad eva nagaraṃ yayau // ViP_2,16.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4882: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4886: dṛṣṭvā nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur upagamyābhivādya ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4887: uvāca kasmād ekānte sthīyate bhavatā dvija // ViP_2,16.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4889: bho vipra janasaṃmardo mahān eṣa nareśvare /
GP12vipce_pu:4890: pravivikṣau puraṃ ramyaṃ tenātra sthīyate mayā // ViP_2,16.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4893: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvam abhijño mato mama // ViP_2,16.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4898: etau hi gajarājānau yugapad darśitau mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4901: jñātum icchāmy ahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // ViP_2,16.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4903: gajo yo 'yam adho brahmann upary asyaiva bhūpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4904: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // ViP_2,16.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4906: jānāmy ahaṃ yathā brahmaṃs tathā mām avabodhaya /
GP12vipce_pu:4907: adhaḥśabdanigadyaṃ kiṃ kiṃ cordhvam abhidhīyate // ViP_2,16.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4909: ity uktaḥ sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha tam ṛbhum /
GP12vipce_pu:4910: śrūyatāṃ kathayāmy eṣa yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,16.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4911: upary ahaṃ yathā rājā tvam adhaḥ kuñjaro yathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4912: avabodhāya te brahman dṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // ViP_2,16.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4914: tvaṃ rājeva dvijaśreṣṭha sthito 'haṃ gajavad yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4915: tad eva tvaṃ mamācakṣva katamas tvam ahaṃ tathā // ViP_2,16.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4917: ity uktaḥ satvaras tasya pragṛhya caraṇāv ubhau /
GP12vipce_pu:4918: nidāghaḥ prāha bhagavān ācāryas tvam ṛbhur dhruvam // ViP_2,16.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4920: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptam ahaṃ gurum // ViP_2,16.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4923: gurus te 'ham ṛbhur nāmnā nidāgha samupāgataḥ // ViP_2,16.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4924: tad etad upadiṣṭaṃ te saṃkṣepeṇa mahāmate /
GP12vipce_pu:4927: evam uktvā yayau vidvān nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur guruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4930: tathā brahma tato muktim avāpa paramāṃ dvijaḥ // ViP_2,16.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4932: bhava sarvagataṃ jānann ātmānam avanīpate // ViP_2,16.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4934: bhrāntadṛṣṭibhir ātmāpi tathaikaḥ san pṛthak pṛthak // ViP_2,16.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4935: ekaḥ samastaṃ yad ihāsti kiṃcit tad acyuto vāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12vipce_pu:4936: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvam etad ātmasvarūpaṃ tyaja bhedamoham //
GP12vipce_pu:4938: itīritas tena sa rājavaryas tatyāja bhedaṃ paramārthadṛṣṭiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4939: sa cāpi jātismaraṇāptabodhas tatraiva janmany apavargam āpa // ViP_2,16.24
GP12vipce_pu:4940: iti bharatanarendrasāravṛttaṃ kathayati yaś ca śṛṇoti bhaktiyuktaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4941: sa vimalamatir eti nātmamohaṃ bhavati ca saṃsaraṇeṣu muktiyogyaḥ //
GP12vipce_pu:4945: sūryādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ jyotiṣām api vistarāt // ViP_3,1.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4946: devādīnāṃ tathā sṛṣṭir ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi varṇitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4949: manvantarāṇy aśeṣāṇi śrotum icchāmy anukramāt // ViP_3,1.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4951: bhavatā kathitān etāñ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ guro // ViP_3,1.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4954: tāny ahaṃ bhavate samyak kathayāmi yathākramam // ViP_3,1.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4955: svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ manuḥ svārociṣas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4956: uttamas tāmasaś caiva raivataś cākṣuṣas tathā // ViP_3,1.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4957: ṣaḍ ete manavo 'tītāḥ sāmprataṃ tu raveḥ sutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4959: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ tu kathitaṃ kalpādāv antaraṃ mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4960: devās tatrarṣayaś caiva yathāvat kathitā mayā // ViP_3,1.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4961: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi manoḥ svārociṣasya tu /
GP12vipce_pu:4962: manvantarādhipān samyag devarṣīṃs tatsutāṃs tathā // ViP_3,1.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4964: vipaścit tatra devendro maitreyāsīn mahābalaḥ // ViP_3,1.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4965: ūrjaḥ stambhas tathā prāṇo dattolir ṛṣabhas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4966: niścaraś cārvarīvāṃś ca tatra saptarṣayo 'bhavan // ViP_3,1.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4968: dvitīyam etat kathitam antaraṃ śṛṇu cottaram // ViP_3,1.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4969: tṛtīye 'py antare brahmann uttamo nāma yo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4970: suśāntir nāma devendro maitreyābhūt sureśvaraḥ // ViP_3,1.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4971: sudhāmānas tathā satyāḥ śivāś cāsan pratardanāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4972: vaśavartinaś ca pañcaite gaṇā dvādaśakāḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4976: satyāś ca sudhiyaś caiva saptaviṃśatikā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4978: saptarṣayaś ca ye teṣāṃ tatra nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4979: jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ kāvyaś caitro 'gnir vanakas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4980: pīvaraś carṣayo hy ete sapta tatrāpi cāntare // ViP_3,1.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4982: putrās tu tāmasasyāsan rājānaḥ sumahābalāḥ // ViP_3,1.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4983: pañcame cāpi maitreya raivato nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4984: manur vibhuś ca tatrendro devāṃś caivāntare śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4986: ete devagaṇās tatra caturdaśa caturdaśa // ViP_3,1.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4988: vedabāhuḥ sudhāmā ca parjanyaś ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4989: ete saptarṣayo vipra tatrāsan raivate 'ntare // ViP_3,1.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4992: svārociṣaś cottamaś ca tāmaso raivatas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4993: priyavratānvayā hy ete catvāro manavaḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4994: viṣṇum ārādhya tapasā sa rājarṣiḥ priyavrataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4996: ṣaṣṭhe manvantare cāsīc cākṣuṣākhyas tathā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4997: manojavas tathaivendro devān api nibodha me // ViP_3,1.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4998: āpyāḥ prasūtā bhavyāś ca pṛthugāś ca divaukasaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4999: mahānubhāvā lekhāś ca pañcaite hy aṣṭakā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5000: sumedhā virajāś caiva haviṣmān uttamo madhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5001: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca saptāsann iti carṣayaḥ // ViP_3,1.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:5005: manuḥ saṃvartate dhīmān sāmprataṃ saptame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5010: ikṣvākuś ca nṛgaś caiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5011: nariṣyantaś ca vikhyāto nābhāgo diṣṭa eva ca // ViP_3,1.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5012: karūṣaś ca pṛṣadhraś ca vasumāṃl lokaviśrutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5013: manor vaivasvatasyaite nava putrāḥ sudhārmikāḥ // ViP_3,1.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5017: ākūtyāṃ mānaso deva utpannaḥ prathame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5018: tataḥ punaḥ sa vai devaḥ prāpte svārociṣe 'ntare /
GP12vipce_pu:5019: tuṣitāyāṃ samutpanno hy ajitas tuṣitaiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5020: auttame hy antare cāpi tuṣitas tu punaḥ sa vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5021: satyāyām abhavat satyaḥ satyaiḥ saha surottamaiḥ // ViP_3,1.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5022: tāmasasyāntare caiva saṃprāpte punar eva hi /
GP12vipce_pu:5023: haryāyāṃ haribhiḥ sārdhaṃ harir eva babhūva ha // ViP_3,1.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5025: saṃbhūto rājasaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair devavaro hariḥ // ViP_3,1.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5027: vikuṇṭhāyām asau jajñe vaikuṇṭhair daivataiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:5028: manvantare tu saṃprāpte tathā vaivasvate dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5029: vāmanaḥ kaśyapād viṣṇur adityāṃ saṃbabhūva ha // ViP_3,1.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5030: tribhiḥ kramair imāṃl lokāñ jitvā yena mahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:5032: ity etās tanavas tasya sapta manvantareṣu vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5033: saptasv evābhavan vipra yābhiḥ saṃrakṣitāḥ prajāḥ // ViP_3,1.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5034: yasmād viṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ tasya śaktyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5035: tasmāt sa procyate viṣṇur viśer dhātoḥ praveśanāt // ViP_3,1.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5036: sarve ca devā manavaḥ samastāḥ saptarṣayo ye manusūnavaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5037: indraś ca yo yas tridaśeśabhūto viṣṇor aśeṣās tu vibhūtayas tāḥ //
GP12vipce_pu:5040: proktāny etāni bhavatā sapta manvantarāṇi vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5041: bhaviṣyāṇy api viprarṣe mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // ViP_3,2.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5044: manur yamo yamī caiva tadapatyāni vai mune // ViP_3,2.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:5045: asahantī tu sā bhartus tejaś chāyāṃ yuyoja vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5046: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇe 'raṇyaṃ svayaṃ ca tapase yayau // ViP_3,2.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:5047: saṃjñeyam ity athārkaś ca chāyāyām ātmajatrayam /
GP12vipce_pu:5048: śanaiścaraṃ manuṃ cānyaṃ tapatīṃ cāpy ajījanat // ViP_3,2.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:5049: chāyāsaṃjñā dadau śāpaṃ yamāya kupitā yadā /
GP12vipce_pu:5050: tadānyeyam asau buddhir ity āsīd yamasūryayoḥ // ViP_3,2.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:5052: samādhidṛṣṭyā dadṛśe tām aśvāṃ tapasi sthitām // ViP_3,2.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:5054: janayām āsa revantaṃ retaso 'nte ca bhāskaraḥ // ViP_3,2.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:5055: āninye ca punaḥ saṃjñāṃ svasthānaṃ bhagavān raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5056: tejasaḥ śamanaṃ cāsya viśvakarmā cakāra ha // ViP_3,2.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:5057: bhramam āropya sūryaṃ tu tasya tejoviśātanam /
GP12vipce_pu:5058: kṛtavān aṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ na vyaśātayatāvyayam // ViP_3,2.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:5059: yat sūryād vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ śātitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā /
GP12vipce_pu:5060: jājvalyamānam apatat tad bhūmau munisattama // ViP_3,2.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:5061: tvaṣṭaiva tejasā tena viṣṇoś cakram akalpayat /
GP12vipce_pu:5062: triśūlaṃ caiva śarvasya śibikāṃ dhanadasya ca // ViP_3,2.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:5063: śaktiṃ guhasya devānām anyeṣāṃ ca yad āyudham /
GP12vipce_pu:5064: tat sarvaṃ tejasā tena viśvakarmā vyavardhayat // ViP_3,2.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:5066: pūrvajasya savarṇo 'sau sāvarṇis tena kathyate // ViP_3,2.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:5067: tasya manvantaraṃ hy etat sāvarṇikam athāṣṭamam /
GP12vipce_pu:5068: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhaviṣyaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:5069: sāvarṇis tu manur yo 'sau maitreya bhavitā tataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5070: sutapāś cāmitābhāś ca mukhyāś cāpi tadā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:5071: teṣāṃ gaṇas tu devānām ekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5072: saptarṣīn api vakṣyāmi bhaviṣyān munisattama // ViP_3,2.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:5073: dīptimān gālavo rāmaḥ kṛpo drauṇis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5074: matputraś ca tathā vyāsa ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca saptamaḥ // ViP_3,2.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:5076: virocanasutas teṣāṃ balir indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:5078: sāvarṇes tu manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyanti nareśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:5079: navamo dakṣasāvarṇir maitreya bhavitā manuḥ // ViP_3,2.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:5080: pārā marīcigarbhāś ca sudharmāṇas tathā tridhā /
GP12vipce_pu:5081: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:5082: teṣām indro mahāvīryo bhaviṣyaty adbhuto dvija // ViP_3,2.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:5083: savano dyutimān bhavyo vasur medhātithis tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5084: jyotiṣmān saptamaḥ satyas tatraite ca maharṣayaḥ // ViP_3,2.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:5088: sudhāmāno viruddhāś ca śatasaṃkhyās tathā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:5089: teṣām indraś ca bhavitā śāntir nāma mahābalaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5090: saptarṣayo bhaviṣyanti ye tadā tāñ chṛṇuṣva ca // ViP_3,2.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:5091: haviṣmān sukṛtiḥ satyo hy apāṃmūrtis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5092: nābhāgo 'pratimaujāś ca satyaketus tathaiva ca // ViP_3,2.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5095: ekādaśaś ca bhavitā dharmasāvarṇiko manuḥ // ViP_3,2.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:5097: gaṇās tv ete tadā mukhyā devānāṃ ca bhaviṣyatām /
GP12vipce_pu:5098: ekaikas triṃśakas teṣāṃ gaṇaś cendraś ca vai vṛṣaḥ // ViP_3,2.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5099: niścaraś cāgnitejāś ca vapuṣmān viṣṇur āruṇiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5100: haviṣmān anaghaś caite bhavyāḥ saptarṣayas tathā // ViP_3,2.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:5102: bhaviṣyanti manos tasya tanayāḥ pṛthivīśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:5103: rudraputras tu sāvarṇir bhavitā dvādaśo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5104: ṛtadhāmā ca tatrendro bhavitā śṛṇu me surān // ViP_3,2.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5105: haritā lohitā devās tathā sumanaso dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5106: sukarmāṇaḥ supārāś ca daśakāḥ pañca vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5108: tapodhṛtir dyutiś cānyaḥ saptamas tu tapodhanaḥ // ViP_3,2.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:5110: manos tasya mahāvīryā bhaviṣyanti sutā nṛpāḥ // ViP_3,2.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5111: trayodaśo raucyanāmā bhaviṣyati mune manuḥ // ViP_3,2.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5113: trayas triṃśadvibhedās te devānāṃ ye tu vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5114: divaspatir mahāvīryas teṣām indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5116: dhṛtimān avyayaś cānyaḥ saptamaḥ sutapā muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5117: saptarṣayas tv ime tasya putrān api nibodha me // ViP_3,2.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5119: bhautyaś caturdaśaś cātra maitreya bhavitā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5120: śucir indraḥ suragaṇās tatra pañca śṛṇuṣva tān // ViP_3,2.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5121: cākṣuṣāś ca pavitrāś ca kaniṣṭhā bhrājirās tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5122: vācāvṛddhāś ca vai devāḥ saptarṣīn api me śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:5123: agnibāhuḥ śuciḥ śukro māgadho 'gnīdhra eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5124: yuktas tathā jitaś cānyo manuputrān ataḥ śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5126: kathitā muniśārdūla pālayiṣyanti ye mahīm // ViP_3,2.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5128: pravartayanti tān etya bhuvi saptarṣayo divaḥ // ViP_3,2.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:5129: kṛte kṛte smṛter vipra praṇetā jāyate manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5130: devā yajñabhujas te tu yāvan manvantaraṃ tu tat // ViP_3,2.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:5131: bhavanti ye manoḥ putrā yāvan manvantaraṃ tu taiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5132: tadanvayodbhavaiś caiva tāvad bhūḥ paripālyate // ViP_3,2.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:5133: manuḥ saptarṣayo devā bhūpālāś ca manoḥ sutāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5134: manvantare bhavanty ete śakraś caivādhikāriṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:5135: caturdaśabhir etais tu gatair manvantarair dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5137: tāvatpramāṇā ca niśā tato bhavati sattama /
GP12vipce_pu:5139: trailokyam akhilaṃ grastvā bhagavān ādikṛd vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5141: tataḥ prabuddho bhagavān yathā pūrvaṃ tathā punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5142: sṛṣṭiṃ karoty avyayātmā kalpe kalpe rajoguṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:5143: manavo bhūbhujaḥ sendrā devāḥ saptarṣayas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5146: yugavyavasthāṃ kurute yathā maitreya tac chṛṇu // ViP_3,2.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:5150: duṣṭānāṃ nigrahaṃ kurvan paripāti jagattrayam // ViP_3,2.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:5151: vedam ekaṃ caturbhedaṃ kṛtvā śākhāśatair vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5153: vedāṃs tu dvāpare vyasya kaler ante punar hariḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5154: kalkisvarūpī durvṛttān mārge sthāpayati prabhuḥ // ViP_3,2.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:5155: evam eṣa jagat sarvaṃ paripāti karoti ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5156: hanti cānteṣv anantātmā nāsty asmād vyatireki yat // ViP_3,2.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:5157: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvabhūtān mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5158: tad atrānyatra vā vipra sadbhāvaḥ kathitas tava // ViP_3,2.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:5160: manvantarādhipāṃś caiva kim anyat kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:5163: jñātam etan mayā tvatto yathā sarvam idaṃ jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:5164: viṣṇur viṣṇau viṣṇutaś ca na paraṃ vidyate tataḥ // ViP_3,3.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5165: etat tu śrotum icchāmi vyastā vedā mahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:5166: vedavyāsasvarūpeṇa yathā tena yuge yuge // ViP_3,3.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:5167: yasmin yasmin yuge vyāso yo ya āsīn mahāmune /
GP12vipce_pu:5168: taṃ tam ācakṣva bhagavañ śākhābhedāṃś ca me vada // ViP_3,3.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:5171: na śakyo vistaro vaktuṃ saṃkṣepeṇa śṛṇuṣva tam // ViP_3,3.4 //

GP12vipce_pu:6853_0: tāvac ca trimārgaparivartair anekayugaparivṛttitiṣṭhann api raivataḥ śṛṇvan muhūrtam iva mene gītāvasāne ca bhagavantam abjayoniṃ

GP12vipce_pu:6858: ya ete bhavato 'bhimatā naiteṣāṃ sāmpratam apatyāpatyasaṃtatir apy avanītale 'sti || ViP_4,1.52

GP12vipce_pu:6864: bhagavann evam avasthite mayeyaṃ kasmai deyeti || ViP_4,1.58 ||

GP12vipce_pu:6866: na hy ādimadhyāntam ajasya yasya vidmo vayaṃ sarvamayasya dhātuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6867: na ca svarūpaṃ na paraṃ svabhāvaṃ na caiva sāraṃ parameśvarasya //
GP12vipce_pu:6868: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6870: yasya prasādād aham acyutasya bhūtaḥ prajāsṛṣṭikaro 'ntakārī /
GP12vipce_pu:6871: krodhāc ca rudraḥ sthitihetubhūto yasmāc ca madhye puruṣaḥ parasmāt //
GP12vipce_pu:6872: madrūpam āsthāya sṛjaty ajo yaḥ sthitau ca yo 'sau puruṣasvarūpī /
GP12vipce_pu:6873: rudrasvarūpeṇa ca yo 'tti viśvaṃ dhatte tathānantavapuḥ samastam //
GP12vipce_pu:6874: śakrādirūpī paripāti viśvam arkendurūpaś ca tamo hinasti /
GP12vipce_pu:6875: pākāya yo 'gnitvam upetya lokān bibharti pṛthvīvapur avyayātmā //
GP12vipce_pu:6876: ceṣṭāṃ karoti śvasanasvarūpī lokasya tṛptiṃ ca jalānnarūpī /
GP12vipce_pu:6877: dadāti viśvasthitisaṃsthitas tu sarvāvakāśaṃ ca nabhaḥsvarūpī //
GP12vipce_pu:6878: yaḥ sṛjyate sargakṛd ātmanaiva yaḥ pālyate pālayitā ca devaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6879: viśvātmanā saṃhriyate 'ntakārī pṛthak trayasyāsya ca yo 'vyayātmā //
GP12vipce_pu:6880: yasmiñ jagad yo jagad etad ādyo yaś cāśrito 'smiñ jagati svayaṃbhūḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6881: sa sarvabhūtaprabhavo dharitryāṃ svāṃśena viṣṇur nṛpate 'vatīrṇaḥ //
GP12vipce_pu:6882: kuśasthalī yā tava bhūpa ramyā purī purābhūd amarāvatīva /

GP12vipce_pu:6887: itīrito 'sau kamalodbhavena bhuvaṃ samāsādya patiḥ prajānām /

GP12vipce_pu:6897: yāvac ca brahmalokāt kakudmī raivato nābhyeti tāvat puṇyajanasaṃjñā rākṣasās tām asya purīṃ kuśasthalīṃ jaghnuḥ || ViP_4,2.1 ||
GP12vipce_pu:6898: tac cāsya bhrātṛśataṃ puṇyajanatrāsād diśo bheje || ViP_4,2.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:6899: tadanvayāś ca kṣatriyāḥ sarvadikṣv abhavan || ViP_4,2.3 ||
GP12vipce_pu:6904: virūpāt pṛṣadaśvo jajñe tataś ca rathītaraḥ || ViP_4,2.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:6906: ete kṣatraprasūtā vai punaś cāṅgirasāḥ smṛtāḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:6913: sa tatheti gṛhītājño vanam abhyetyānekān mṛgān hatvātiśrānto 'tikṣutparīto

GP12vipce_pu:6922: prasannaś ca devānām anādinidhanaḥ sakalajagatparāyaṇo nārāyaṇaḥ prāha |

GP12vipce_pu:6927: bho bhoḥ kṣatriyavaryāsmābhir abhyarthitena bhavatāsmākam arātivadhodyatānāṃ sāhāyyaṃ kṛtam icchāmaḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:6934_2: viśvagaśvas tasyāpi cāndro yuvanāśvaś cāndrasya tasya yuvanāśvasya śrāvasto yaḥ purīṃ śrāvastīṃ niveśayām āsa || ViP_4,2.20 ||

GP12vipce_pu:6937: tasya ca samastā eva putrā dhundhumukhaniḥśvāsāgninā vipluṣṭā vineśuḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:6939: dṛḍhāśvād dharyaśvas tasmān nikumbho nikumbhāt saṃhitāśvaḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:6967: sa cāpi tatsparśopacīyamānaharṣaprakarṣo bahuprakāraṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyatas tair ātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahānudinaṃ bahuprakāraṃ reme ||

GP12vipce_pu:6969: aho dhanyo 'yam īdṛśam apy anabhimataṃ yonyantaram avāpyaibhir ātmajapautrādibhiḥ saha ramamāṇo 'tīvāsmākaṃ spṛhām utpādayati |

GP12vipce_pu:6999: tataś ca māṃdhātrā muniśāpaśaṅkitena kanyāntaḥpuravarṣavaraḥ samājñaptaḥ

GP12vipce_pu:7001: praveśya ca tam ṛṣim antaḥpuravarṣavaras tāḥ kanyakāḥ prāha || ViP_4,2.54

GP12vipce_pu:7003_1: chande nāhaṃ paripanthānaṃ kariṣyāmīty ākarṇya sarvā eva tāḥ kanyāḥ sānurāgāḥ samanmathāḥ kareṇava ivebhayūthapatiṃ tam ṛṣim

GP12vipce_pu:7007: vṛto mayāyaṃ prathamaṃ mayāyaṃ gṛhaṃ viśann eva vihanyase kim /

GP12vipce_pu:7013: kṛtānurūpavivāhaś ca maharṣiḥ sakalā eva tāḥ kanyāḥ svam āśramam anayat ||

GP12vipce_pu:7014_1: vihaṃgamābhirāmajalāśayāḥ sopavanāḥ sāvakāśāḥ sādhuśayyāparicchadāḥ prāsādāḥ kriyantām ity ādideśa || ViP_4,2.61 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7015: tac ca tathaivānuṣṭhitam aśeṣaśilpaviśeṣācāryas tvaṣṭā darśitavān ||
GP12vipce_pu:7016_0: tataś ca paramarṣiṇā saubhariṇājñaptas teṣu gṛheṣv anapāyī nandanāmā mahānidhir āsāṃ cakre tato 'navaratabhakṣyabhojyalehyādyupabhogair
GP12vipce_pu:7016_1: āgatānugatabhṛtyādīn aharniśam aśeṣagṛheṣu tāḥ kṣitīśaduhitaro bhojayām āsuḥ || ViP_4,2.64 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7017_0: ekadā tu duhitṛsnehākṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ sa mahīpatir atiduḥkhitās tāḥ sukhitā veti vicintya tasya maharṣer āśramam upetya sphuradaṃśumālāṃ
GP12vipce_pu:7018: praviśya caikaṃ prāsādam ātmajāṃ pariṣvajya kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ pravṛddhasnehanayanāmbugarbhanayano 'bravīt || ViP_4,2.66 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7019: apy atra vatse bhavatyāḥ sukham uta kiṃcid asukham api te maharṣiḥ snehavān uta saṃsmaryate 'smadgṛhavāsasyety uktā tattanayā pitaram āha ||
GP12vipce_pu:7020: tātātiramaṇīyaḥ prāsādo 'trātimanojñam upavanam atikalavākyavihaṃgābhirutāḥ protphullapadmākarā jalāśayāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7021: manonukūlabhakṣyabhojyānulepanavastra bhūṣaṇādibhogopabhogā mṛdūni śayanāni sarvasaṃpatsamavetam etad gārhasthyam tathāpi kena vā janmabhūmir na smaryate || ViP_4,2.68 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7023: kiṃtv ekaṃ mamaitad duḥkhakāraṇaṃ yad asmadgṛhān maharṣir ayaṃ madbhartā na niṣkrāmati mamaiva kevalam atiprītyā samīpavartī nānyāsām asmadbhaginīnām || ViP_4,2.70 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7024: evaṃ ca mama sahodaryā duḥkhitā ity evam atiduḥkhakāraṇam ity uktas tayā dvitīyaṃ prāsādam upetya svatanayāṃ pariṣvajyopaviṣṭas tathaiva pṛṣṭavān
GP12vipce_pu:7025_0: tayāpi tathaiva sarvam etat prāsādādyupabhogasukham ākhyātaṃ mamaiva kevalam atiprītyā pārśvavartī nāsmadbhaginīnām ity evamādi
GP12vipce_pu:7025_1: śrutvā samastaprāsādeṣu rājā praviveśa tanayās tathaivāpṛcchat sarvābhiś ca tābhis tathaivābhihitaḥ paritoṣavismayanirbharavivaśahṛdayo
GP12vipce_pu:7026: dṛṣṭas te bhagavan sumahān eṣa siddhiprabhāvo naivaṃvidham anyasya kasyacid asmābhir vibhūtivilasitam upalakṣitaṃ |
GP12vipce_pu:7027: kiyad etad bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ phalam ity abhipūjya tam ṛṣiṃ tatraiva tena ṛṣivaryeṇa saha kiṃcit kālam abhimatopabhogaṃ bubhuje svapuraṃ ca jagāma
GP12vipce_pu:7028: kālena gacchatā tasya rājatanayāsu putraśataṃ sārdham abhavat ||
GP12vipce_pu:7034: apy etatputrān putrasamanvitān paśyeyam evamādimanorathān anudinakālasaṃpattivṛttim avetyaitat saṃcintayām āsa |
GP12vipce_pu:7036: manorathānāṃ na samāptir asti varṣāyutenāpi tathābdalakṣaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7037: pūrṇeṣu pūrṇeṣu punar navānām utpattayaḥ santi manorathānām // ViP_4,2.78
GP12vipce_pu:7038: padbhyāṃ gatā yauvaninaś ca jātā dāraiś ca saṃyogam itāḥ prasūtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7039: dṛṣṭāḥ sutās tattanayaprasūtiṃ draṣṭuṃ punar vāñchati me 'ntarātmā //
GP12vipce_pu:7040: drakṣyāmi teṣām api cet prasūtiṃ manoratho me bhavitā tato 'nyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7041: pūrṇe 'pi tatrāpy aparasya janma nivāryate kena manorathasya // ViP_4,2.80
GP12vipce_pu:7042: āmṛtyuto naiva manorathānām anto 'sti vijñātam idaṃ mayādya /
GP12vipce_pu:7043: manorathāsaktiparasya cittaṃ na jāyate vai paramārthasaṅgi // ViP_4,2.81
GP12vipce_pu:7044: sa me samādhir jalavāsamitra matsyasya saṅgāt sahasaiva naṣṭaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7045: parigrahaḥ saṅgakṛto mamāyaṃ parigrahotthā ca mahāvidhitsā // ViP_4,2.82
GP12vipce_pu:7046: duḥkhaṃ yadaivaikaśarīrajanma śatārdhasaṃkhyaṃ yad idaṃ prasūtam /
GP12vipce_pu:7047: parigraheṇa kṣitipātmajānāṃ sutair anekair bahulīkṛtaṃ tat // ViP_4,2.83
GP12vipce_pu:7048: sutātmajais tattanayaiś ca bhūyo bhūyaś ca teṣāṃ svaparigraheṇa /
GP12vipce_pu:7049: vistāram eṣyaty atiduḥkhahetuḥ parigraho vai mamatānidhānam // ViP_4,2.84
GP12vipce_pu:7050: cīrṇaṃ tapo yat tu jalāśrayeṇa tasyarddhir eṣā tapaso 'ntarāyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7051: matsyasya saṅgād abhavac ca yo me sutādirāgo muṣito 'smi tena //
GP12vipce_pu:7052: niḥsaṅgatā muktipadaṃ yatīnāṃ saṅgād aśeṣāḥ prabhavanti doṣāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7053: ārūḍhayogo 'pi nipātyate 'dhaḥ saṅgena yogī kim utālpasiddhiḥ //
GP12vipce_pu:7055: yathā hi bhūyaḥ parihīnadoṣo janasya duḥkhair bhavitā na duḥkhī //
GP12vipce_pu:7056: sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam aṇor aṇīyāṃsam atipramāṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:7057: sitāsitaṃ ceśvaram īśvarāṇām ārādhayiṣye tapasaiva viṣṇum // ViP_4,2.88 //
GP12vipce_pu:7059: mamācalaṃ cittam apetadoṣaṃ sadāstu viṣṇāv abhavāya bhūyaḥ // ViP_4,2.89
GP12vipce_pu:7060: samastabhūtād amalād anantāt sarveśvarād anyad anādimadhyāt /
GP12vipce_pu:7061: yasmān na kiṃcit tam ahaṃ gurūṇāṃ paraṃ guruṃ saṃśrayam emi viṣṇum //
GP12vipce_pu:7063: ity ātmānam ātmanaivābhidhāyāsau saubharir apahāya putragṛhāsanaparicchadādikam aśeṣam arthajātaṃ sakalabhāryāsamaveto vanaṃ praviveśa || ViP_4,2.91 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7064: tatrāpy anudinaṃ vaikhānasaniṣpādyam aśeṣaṃ kriyākalāpaṃ niṣpādya kṣapitasakalapāpaḥ paripakvamanovṛttir ātmany agnīn samāropya bhikṣur abhavat || ViP_4,2.92 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7065: bhagavaty āsajyākhilakarmakalāpaṃ ajam avikāram amaraṇādidharmam avāpa paraṃ paravatām acyutapadam ity etan māṃdhātur duhitṛsaṃbandhād ākhyātam || ViP_4,2.94 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7066_0: yaś caitat saubharicaritam anusmarati paṭhati śṛṇoti avadhārayati lekhayati tasyāṣṭau janmany asanmatir asaddharmo vā manaso
GP12vipce_pu:7066_1: 'sanmārgācaraṇam aśeṣaheyeṣu vā mamatvaṃ na bhavati || ViP_4,2.95 [[iti śrīviṣṇupurāṇe caturthe 'ṃśe caturthāṃśe dvitīyo
GP12vipce_pu:7069: ambarīṣasya māṃdhātus tanayasya yuvanāśvaḥ putro 'bhūt || ViP_4,3.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7071: rasātale ca mauneyā nāma gandharvāḥ ṣaṭkoṭisaṃkhyās tair aśeṣāṇi nāgakulāny apahṛtapradhānaratnādhipatyāny akriyanta || ViP_4,3.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7072: taiś ca gandharvavīryāvadhūtair urageśvarair bhagavān aśeṣadeveśastavaśravaṇonmīlitonnidrapuṇḍarīkanayano jalaśayano nidrāvasānād vibuddhaḥ praṇipatyābhihitaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7073_0: bhagavann apy asmākam etebhyo gandharvebhyo bhayam upaśamam eṣyatīti āha bhagavān anādipuruṣaḥ puruṣottamo yauvanāśvasya
GP12vipce_pu:7073_1: māṃdhātuḥ purukutsanāmā putras tam aham anupraviśya tān aśeṣaduṣṭagandharvān upaśamaṃ nayiṣyāmi ||
GP12vipce_pu:7074: ity ākarṇya bhagavate kṛtapraṇāmāḥ punar nāgalokam āgatāḥ pannagapatayo narmadāṃ ca purukutsānayanāya codayām āsuḥ || ViP_4,3.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7079: yas te 'nusmaraṇasamavetaṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati na tasya sarpaviṣabhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti atra ca ślokaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7080: narmadāyai namaḥ prātar narmadāyai namo niśi /
GP12vipce_pu:7081: namo 'stu narmade tubhyaṃ trāhi māṃ viṣasarpataḥ // ViP_4,3.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7082: ity uccāryāharniśam andhakārapraveśe vā na sarpair daśyate na cāpi kṛtānusmaraṇabhujo viṣam api bhuktam upaghātāya bhaviṣyati || ViP_4,3.11
GP12vipce_pu:7083: purukutsāya ca saṃtativicchedo na bhavato bhaviṣyatīty uragapatayo varaṃ daduḥ || ViP_4,3.12
GP12vipce_pu:7085: trasadasyutaḥ saṃbhūtas tato 'naraṇyas taṃ rāvaṇo digvijaye nijaghāna |
GP12vipce_pu:7087: tataś ca vasumanās tasyāpi tridhanvā tridhanvanas trayyāruṇaḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:7090: dvādaśavārṣikyām anāvṛṣṭyāṃ viśvāmitrakalatrāpatyapoṣaṇārthaṃ cāṇḍālapratigrahapariharaṇāya jāhnavītīranyagrodhe mṛgamāṃsam anudinaṃ babandha || ViP_4,3.15 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7091: parituṣṭena viśvāmitreṇa saśarīraḥ svargam āropitaḥ || ViP_4,3.16 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7092: triśaṅkor hariścandras tasmād rohitāśvas tataś ca harito haritāc cañcuś cañcor vijayasudevau ruruko vijayād rurukasya vṛkaḥ || ViP_4,3.17 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7093: tato bāhur yo 'sau haihayatālajaṅghādibhir avajito 'ntarvatnyā mahiṣyā saha vanaṃ viveśa || tasyāś ca sapatnyā garbhastambhanāya garo dattaḥ || ViP_4,3.19 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7094: tenāsyā garbhaḥ saptavarṣāṇi jaṭhara eva tasthau |
GP12vipce_pu:7095: sa ca bāhur vṛddhabhāvād aurvāśramasamīpe mamāra || ViP_4,3.20 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7096: sā tasya bhāryā citāṃ kṛtvā tam āropyānumaraṇakṛtaniścayābhūt ||
GP12vipce_pu:7097: athaitām atītānāgatavartamānakālavedī bhagavān aurvaḥ svāśramān nirgatyābravīt |
GP12vipce_pu:7098: alam anenāsadgrāheṇākhilabhūmaṇḍalapatir ativīryaparākramo naikayajñakṛd arātipakṣakṣayakartā tavodare cakravartī tiṣṭhati || ViP_4,3.22 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7099: maivaṃ maivaṃ sāhasādhyavasāyinī bhavetyukte ca sā tasmād anumaraṇanirbandhād virarāma || tenaiva bhagavatā svāśramam ānīyata |
GP12vipce_pu:7100: katipayadinābhyantare ca sahaiva tena gareṇātitejasvī bālako jajñe |
GP12vipce_pu:7101: tasyaurvo jātakarmādikriyāṃ niṣpādya sagara iti nāma cakāra || ViP_4,3.24
GP12vipce_pu:7102: kṛtopanayanaṃ cainam aurvo vedaśāstrāṇy astraṃ cāgneyaṃ bhārgavākhyam adhyāpayām āsa || ViP_4,3.25
GP12vipce_pu:7104: amba katham atra vayaṃ kva tāto 'smākam ity evamādi pṛcchatas tanmātā sarvam avocat || ViP_4,3.26
GP12vipce_pu:7107: śakayavanakāmbojapāradapahlavā hanyamānās tatkulaguruṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ || ViP_4,3.28
GP12vipce_pu:7108: athaitān vasiṣṭho jīvanmṛtakān kṛtvā sagaram āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7110: ete ca mayaiva tvatpratijñāparipālanāya nijadharmadvijasaṅgaparityāgaṃ kāritāḥ || ViP_4,3.30
GP12vipce_pu:7111_0: sa tatheti tad guruvacanam abhinandya teṣāṃ veṣānyatvam akārayat yavanān muṇḍitaśiraso 'rdhamuṇḍāñ chakān pralambakeśān pāradān
GP12vipce_pu:7111_1: pahlavāṃś ca śmaśrudharān niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārān etān anyāṃś ca kṣatriyāṃś cakāra ||
GP12vipce_pu:7112: te ca nijadharmaparityāgād brāhmaṇaiś ca parityaktā mlecchatāṃ yayuḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:7113: sagaro 'pi svam adhiṣṭhānam āgamya askhalitacakraḥ saptadvīpavatīm imām
GP12vipce_pu:7117: kāśyapaduhitā sumatir vidarbharājatanayā keśinī ca dve bhārye sagarasyāstām || ViP_4,4.1 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7118: tābhyāṃ cāpatyārtham ārādhita aurvaḥ parameṇa samādhinā varam adāt ||
GP12vipce_pu:7119: ekā vaṃśadharam ekaṃ putram aparā ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi janayiṣyati ||
GP12vipce_pu:7120: yasyā yad abhimataṃ tad icchayā gṛhyatām ity ukte keśinī putram ekaṃ sumatiḥ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ vavre || ViP_4,4.3 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7121: tatheti ca ṛṣiṇābhihite 'lpair evāhobhiḥ keśinī putram ekam asamañjasaṃ nāma vaṃśadharam asūta |
GP12vipce_pu:7122: vinatātanayāyās tu sumatyāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇy abhavan || ViP_4,4.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7123: tasmād asamañjaso 'ṃśumān nāma kumāro jajñe || ViP_4,4.5 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7124: sa tv asamañjā bālyād evāpavṛttaḥ pitā cāsyācintayad ayam atītabālyo buddhimān bhaviṣyatīti atha tatrāpi vayasy atīte tac caritam evainaṃ pitā tatyāja || ViP_4,4.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7125: tāny api ṣaṣṭiḥ kumārasahasrāṇy asamañjasaś caritam anucakruḥ || ViP_4,4.8
GP12vipce_pu:7126_0: tataś cāsamañjasaś caritānukāribhiḥ sāgarair apadhvastayajñādisanmārge jagati devāḥ sakalavidyāmayam asaṃspṛṣṭam aśeṣadoṣair
GP12vipce_pu:7126_1: bhagavataḥ puruṣottamasyāṃśabhūtaṃ kapilaṃ praṇamya tad artham ūcuḥ bhagavann ebhiḥ sagaratanayair asamañjasaś caritam anugamyate |
GP12vipce_pu:7127_0: katham evam ebhir anusaradbhir jagad bhaviṣyatīty ārtajagatparitrāṇāya ca bhagavato 'tra śarīragrahaṇam ity ākarṇya bhagavān
GP12vipce_pu:7127_1: alpair eva dinair ete vinaṅkṣyantīty uktavān || ViP_4,4.10 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7128: tatrāntare ca sagaro hayamedham ārebhe tatra ca putrair adhiṣṭhitam asyāśvaṃ ko 'py apahṛtya bhuvo bilaṃ praviveśa || ViP_4,4.12 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7129: tataś cāśvānveṣaṇāya tanayān yuyoja tatas tattanayāś cāśvakhurapadavīm anusaranto atinirbandhena vasudhātalam ekaiko yojanaṃ yojanam avaneś cakhāna || ViP_4,4.13 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7130: pātāle cāśvaṃ paribhramantaṃ tam avanīpatitanayās te dadṛśuḥ || ViP_4,4.14
GP12vipce_pu:7131: nātidūrāvasthitaṃ ca bhagavantam apaghane śaratkāle 'rkam iva tejobhir anavaratam ūrdhvam adhaś cāśeṣadiśaś codbhāsayamānaṃ kapilarṣim apaśyan ||
GP12vipce_pu:7132: tataś codyatāyudhā durātmāyam asmadapakārī yajñavighātakartā hayahartā hanyatāṃ hanyatām ity avocan |
GP12vipce_pu:7133: tatas tenāpi bhagavatā kiṃcidīṣatparivartitalocanenāvalokitāḥ svaśarīrasamutthenāgninā dahyamānā vineśuḥ || ViP_4,4.16 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7134: sagaro 'py avagamyāśvānusāri tat putrabalam aśeṣaṃ paramarṣikapilatejasā dagdham aṃśumantam asamañjasaḥ putram aśvānayanāya codayām āsa ||
GP12vipce_pu:7135_0: sa tu sagaratanayakhātamārgeṇa kapilam upagamya bhaktinamras tathā tuṣṭāva yathainaṃ bhagavān āha gacchainaṃ pitāmahāyāśvaṃ
GP12vipce_pu:7135_1: prāpaya varaṃ vṛṇīṣva ca putrapautraś ca te svargād gaṅgāṃ ānayiṣyatīti athāṃśumān api brahmadaṇḍahatānām asmatpitṝṇām asvargayogyānāṃ
GP12vipce_pu:7135_2: svargaprāptikaraṃ varam asmākaṃ bhagavān prayacchatv iti pratyāha ||
GP12vipce_pu:7136: taṃ cāha bhagavān uktam evaitan mayā pautras te tridivād gaṅgāṃ bhuvam ānayiṣyatīti |
GP12vipce_pu:7137: tadambhasā saṃspṛṣṭeṣv asthibhasmasv ete svargam ārokṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:7139_0: yan na kevalam abhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ snānādyupabhogeṣūpakārakam anabhisaṃhitam apy apetaprāṇasyāsthicarmasnāyukeśādyutsṛṣṭaṃ

GP12vipce_pu:7144: dilīpasya bhagīratho yo 'sau gaṅgāṃ svargād ihānīya bhāgīrathīsaṃjñāṃ cakāra || ViP_4,4.25
GP12vipce_pu:7145: bhagīrathāc chrutas tasyāpi nābhāgas tato 'mbarīṣas tasmāt sindhudvīpaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7146: sindhudvīpād ayutāyus tatputraś ca ṛtuparṇo nalasahāyo 'kṣahṛdayajño 'bhūt
GP12vipce_pu:7147: ṛtuparṇaputraḥ sarvakāmas tattanayaḥ sudāsaḥ sudāsāt saudāso mitrasahanāmā
GP12vipce_pu:7148: sa cāṭavyāṃ mṛgayāṃ gato vyāghradvayam apaśyat || ViP_4,4.28 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7149: tābhyāṃ ca tad vanam apamṛgaṃ kṛtaṃ sa caikaṃ tayor bāṇena jaghāna ||

GP12vipce_pu:7303: ghṛtamātraṃ ca mamāhāra ity evam eveti bhūpatir āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7304: tayā ca sahāvanīpatir alakāyāṃ caitrarathādivaneṣv amalapadmaṣaṇḍeṣu saraḥsv abhiramamāṇa ekaṣaṣṭivarṣāṇy anudinapravardhamānapramodo 'nayat ||
GP12vipce_pu:7305: urvaśī ca tadupabhogāt pratidinapravardhamānānurāgā amaralokavāse 'pi na spṛhāṃ cakāra || vinā corvaśyā suraloko 'psarasāṃ siddhagandharvāṇāṃ ca nātiramaṇīyo
GP12vipce_pu:7307: tataś corvaśīpurūravasoḥ samayavid viśvāvasur gandharvasamaveto niśi śayanābhyāśād ekam uraṇakaṃ jahāra || ViP_4,6.33 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7309: āha ca mamānāthāyāḥ putraḥ kenāpy'pahriyate kaṃ śaraṇam upayāmīty V iti ākarṇya rājā nagnaṃ māṃ devī drakṣyatīti na yayau |
GP12vipce_pu:7310: athānyam apy uraṇakam ādāya gandharvā yayuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7311: tasyāpy apahriyamāṇasyaśabdam ākarṇya'kāśe punar apy anāthāsmy aham abhartṛkā kupuruṣāśrayety ārtarāviṇī babhūva || ViP_4,6.34 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7312: rājāpy amarṣavaśād andhakāram etad iti khaḍgam ādāya duṣṭa duṣṭa hato
GP12vipce_pu:7314: tāvac ca gandharvair atīvojjvalā vidyuj janitā |
GP12vipce_pu:7315: tatprabhayā corvaśī rājānam apagatāmbaraṃ dṛṣṭvāpavṛttasamayā tatkṣaṇād evāpakrāntā || ViP_4,6.36
GP12vipce_pu:7316: parityajya tāv uraṇakau gandharvāḥ suralokam upagatāḥ || ViP_4,6.37 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7317: rājāpi ca tau meṣāv ādāya hṛṣṭamanāḥ svaśayanam āyāto norvaśīṃ dadarśa ||
GP12vipce_pu:7319: kurukṣetre cāmbhojasarasy anyābhiś catasṛbhir apsarobhiḥ samavetām urvaśīṃ dadarśa |
GP12vipce_pu:7320: tataś conmattarūpo jāye he tiṣṭha manasi ghore tiṣṭha vacasīty anekaprakāraṃ sūktam avocat āha corvaśī |
GP12vipce_pu:7321_0: mahārājālam anenāvivekaceṣṭitenāntarvatny aham abdānte bhavatātrāgantavyaṃ kumāras te bhaviṣyatīty ekāṃ ca niśām ahaṃ tvayā
GP12vipce_pu:7321_1: saha vatsyāmīty uktaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ svapuraṃ jagāma || ViP_4,6.40 tāsāṃ cāpsarasām urvaśī kathayām āsa |
GP12vipce_pu:7322: ayaṃ sa puruṣotkarṣṭo yenāham etāvantaṃ kālam anurāgākṛṣṭamānasā sahoṣitety evam uktās tām apsarasa ūcuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7323: sādhu sādhv asya rūpam anena sahāsmākam api sarvakālam abhirantuṃ spṛhā bhavet |
GP12vipce_pu:7324: ity abde ca pūrṇe sa rājā tatrājagāma |
GP12vipce_pu:7325: kumāraṃ cāyuṣam asmai tadorvaśī dadau || ViP_4,6.41 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7326: ekāṃ ca niśāṃ tena rājñā sahoṣitvā pañcaputrotpattaye garbham avāpa ||
GP12vipce_pu:7327: uvāca cainaṃ rājānam asmatprītyā mahārājāya sarva eva gandharvā varadāḥ saṃvṛttā vriyatāṃ vara iti || ViP_4,6.43 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7329: vijitasakalārātir avihatendriyasāmarthyo bandhumān amitabalakośo nānyad asmākam urvaśīsālokyād aprāpyam asti |
GP12vipce_pu:7330: tad aham anayā sahorvaśyā kālaṃ netum abhilaṣāmi || ViP_4,6.44 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7331: ity ukte gandharvā rājñe 'gnisthālīṃ daduḥ || ViP_4,6.45 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7332_0: ūcuś cainam agnim āmnāyānusārī bhūtvā tridhā kṛtvorvaśīsalokatāmanoratham uddiśya samyag yajethās tato 'vaśyam abhilaṣitam
GP12vipce_pu:7332_1: avāpsyasīty uktas tām agnisthālīm ādāyājagāma antar aṭavyām acintayad aho me 'timūḍhatā yad agnisthalī mayānītā norvaśīti |
GP12vipce_pu:7333: athainām aṭavyām evāgnisthālīṃ tatyāja svapuraṃ cājagāma || ViP_4,6.46 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7335: mamorvaśīsālokyaprāptyartham agnisthālī gandharvair dattā sā ca mayāṭavyāṃ parityaktā |
GP12vipce_pu:7336: tad ahaṃ tatra tadāharaṇāya yāsyāmīty utthāya tatrāpy upagato nāgnisthālīm apaśyat |
GP12vipce_pu:7338: mayātra sthālī nikṣiptā sā cāśvatthaḥ śamīgarbho 'bhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:7339: tad enam evāham agnirūpam ādāya svapuram abhigamyāraṇīṃ kṛtvā tadutpannāgner upāstiṃ kariṣyāmīty evam eva svapuram upagato 'raṇiṃ cakāra
GP12vipce_pu:7342_0: tatrāgniṃ nirmathyāgnitrayam āmnāyānusārī bhūtvā juhāva urvaśīsālokyaṃ ca phalam abhisaṃhitavān tenaivāgnividhinā bahuvidhān
GP12vipce_pu:7342_1: yajñān iṣṭvā gāndharvalokān avāpyorvaśyā saha viyogaṃ nāvāpa eko 'gnir ādāv abhavad ailena tv atra manvantare tredhā pravartita
GP12vipce_pu:7345: tasyāpy āyur dhīmān amāvasur viśvāvasuḥ śatāyur śrutāyuḥ saṃjñāḥ ṣaḍ abhavan putrāḥ || ViP_4,7.1
GP12vipce_pu:7347: bhīmasya kāñcanaḥ kāñcanāt suhotras tasyāpi jahnuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7348: yo 'sau yajñavāṭam akhilaṃ gaṅgāmbhasā plāvitam ālokya krodhasaṃraktanayano bhagavantaṃ yajñapuruṣam ātmani parameṇa samādhinā
GP12vipce_pu:7353: tasyāpy ajakas tato balākāśvas tasmāt kuśaḥ kuśasya kuśāmbakuśanābhāmūrtarayāmāvasavaś catvāraḥ putrā babhūvuḥ || ViP_4,7.5 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7354: teṣāṃ kuśāmbaḥ śakratulyo me putro bhaved iti tapaś cakāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7355: taṃ cogratapasam avalokya mā bhavatv anyo 'smattulyavīrya ity ātmanaivāsyendraḥ putratvam agacchat || ViP_4,7.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7358: tāṃ ca bhārgava ṛcīko vavre || ViP_4,7.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7359: gādhir apy atiroṣaṇāyātivṛddhāya ca brāhmaṇāya dātum anicchann ekataḥ śyāmakarṇānām induvarcasām anilaraṃhasām aśvānāṃ sahasraṃ kanyāśulkam ayācata || ViP_4,7.8 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7363: ṛcīkaś ca tasyāś carum apatyārthaṃ cakāra || ViP_4,7.9 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7364: tatprasāditaś ca tanmātre kṣatravaraputrotpattaye carum aparaṃ sādhayām āsa || ViP_4,7.10
GP12vipce_pu:7365: eṣa carur bhavatyāyam aparas tvanmātrā samyag upayojya ity uktvā vanaṃ jagāma || ViP_4,7.11
GP12vipce_pu:7366: upayogakāle ca tāṃ mātā satyavatīm āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7367: putri sarva evātmaputram atiguṇaṃ samabhilaṣati nātmajāyābhrātṛguṇeṣv atīvādṛto bhavati ||
GP12vipce_pu:7368: ato 'rhasi mamātmīyaṃ caruṃ dātuṃ madīyaṃ carum ātmanopayoktum ||
GP12vipce_pu:7369: matputreṇa hi sakalabhūmaṇḍalaparipālanaṃ kāryaṃ kiyad vā brāhmaṇasya balavīryasaṃpad ity uktvā sā svacaruṃ mātre dattavatī || ViP_4,7.13 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7370: atha vanād apy āgamya satyavatīm ṛṣir apaśyat || ViP_4,7.14 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7371: āha cainām atipāpe kim idam akāryaṃ bhavatyā kṛtam |
GP12vipce_pu:7373: nūnaṃ tvayā tvanmātṛsātkṛtaś carur upayukto na yuktam etat || ViP_4,7.15
GP12vipce_pu:7374: mayā hi tatra carau sakalaiva śauryavīryabalasaṃpad āropitā |
GP12vipce_pu:7376: etac ca viparītaṃ kurvantyās tavātiraudrāstradhāraṇamāraṇaniṣṭhaḥ kṣatriyācāraḥ putro bhaviṣyaty asyā |
GP12vipce_pu:7377: copaśamarucir brāhmaṇācāra ity ākarṇyaiva sā tasya pādau jagrāha ||
GP12vipce_pu:7382: kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautro bhavatv ity ukto munir apy āhaivam astv iti ||
GP12vipce_pu:7385: satyavatī ca kauśikī nāma nady abhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7386: jamadagnir ikṣvākuvaṃśodbhavasya reṇos tanayāṃ reṇukām upayeme |
GP12vipce_pu:7387: tasyāṃ cāśeṣakṣatrahantāraṃ paraśurāmasaṃjñaṃ bhagavataḥ sakalalokaguror nārāyaṇasyāṃśaṃ jamadagnir ajījanat || ViP_4,7.18 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7388: viśvāmitraputras tu bhārgava eva śunaḥśepo devair dattaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7390: tataś cānye madhucchandajayakṛtadevāṣṭakakacchapahārītakākhyā viśvāmitraputrā babhūvuḥ || teṣāṃ ca bahūni kauśikagotrāṇy ṛṣyantareṣu vaivāhyāni bhavantīti ||
GP12vipce_pu:7393: purūravaso jyeṣṭhaputro yas tv āyurnāmā sa rāhor duhitaram upayeme ||
GP12vipce_pu:7394: tasyāṃ sa pañca putrān utpādayām āsa |
GP12vipce_pu:7401: sa hi saṃsiddhakāryakaraṇaḥ sakalasaṃbhūtiṣv aśeṣajñānavid bhagavatā nārāyaṇena cātītasaṃbhūtāv asmai varo dattaḥ || ViP_4,8.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7402: kāśīrājagotre 'vatīrya tvam aṣṭadhā samyag āyurvedaṃ kariṣyasi yajñabhāk
GP12vipce_pu:7404: tasya ca dhanvantareḥ putraḥ ketumān ketumato bhīmarathaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7406: sa ca bhadraśreṇyavaṃśavināśād aśeṣāḥ śatravo 'nena jitā iti śatrujid
GP12vipce_pu:7408: tena ca prītimatātmaputro vatsa vatsety abhihitas tato vatso sāv 'bhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7410: punaś ca kuvalayanāmānam aśvaṃ lebhe tataḥ kuvalayāśva ity asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ prathitaḥ || ViP_4,8.7
GP12vipce_pu:7414: alarkād aparo nānyo bubhuje medinīṃ yuvā // ViP_4,8.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7416: tataḥ sunīthas tasya suketus tato dharmaketuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7417: tataḥ satyaketus tasmād vibhus tattanayaḥ suvibhus tataś ca sukumāras tasyāpi dṛṣṭaketuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7418: tataś ca vainahotras tataś ca bhargo bhārgasya bhārgabhūmiḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7419: tataś cāturvarṇyapravṛttiḥ ity ete kāśayo bhūpatayaḥ kathitāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7420: rajes tu saṃtatiḥ śrūyatām iti || ViP_4,8.9 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7423: rajeḥ pañca putraśatāny atulavīryasārāṇy āsan || ViP_4,9.1 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7424: devāsurasaṃgrāmārambhe parasparavadhepsavo devāś cāsurāś ca brahmāṇam papracchuḥ || ViP_4,9.2
GP12vipce_pu:7425: bhagavann asmākam atra virodhe kataraḥ pakṣo jetā bhaviṣyatīti ||
GP12vipce_pu:7426: athāha bhagavān yeṣām arthe rajir āttāyudho yotsyatīti |
GP12vipce_pu:7427: atha daityair upetya rajir ātmasāhāyyadānāyābhyarthitaḥ prāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7428: yotsye 'haṃ bhavatām arthe yady aham amarajayād bhavatām indro bhaviṣyāmīty ākarṇyaitat tair abhihito na vayam anyathā vadiṣyāmo 'nyathā
GP12vipce_pu:7429_0: kariṣyāmo 'smākam indraḥ prahlādas tadartham ayam udyama ity uktvā gateṣv asureṣu devair apy asāv avanīpatir evam evoktas
GP12vipce_pu:7429_1: tenāpi ca tathaivokte devair indras tvaṃ bhaviṣyasīti samanvicchitam rajināpi devasainyasahāyenānekair mahāstrais tad aśeṣam
GP12vipce_pu:7431: bhayatrāṇadānād asmatpitā bavān aśeṣalokānām uttamo bhavān yasyāhaṃ putras trilokendraḥ || sa cāpi rājā prahasyāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7432: evam evāstv anatikramaṇīyā hi vairipakṣād apy anekavidhacāṭuvākyagarbhā praṇatir ity uktvā svapuraṃ jagāma || ViP_4,9.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7434: svaryāte tu rajau nāradarṣicoditā rajisutāḥ śatakratum ātmapitṛputraṃ ācārād rājyaṃ yācitavantaḥ apradāne cāvajityendram atibalinaḥ svayam indratvaṃ cakruḥ || ViP_4,9.10
GP12vipce_pu:7435: tataś ca bahutithe kāle vyatīte bṛhaspatim ekānte dṛṣṭvāpahṛtatrailokyayajñabhāgaḥ śatakratur uvāca || ViP_4,9.11 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7436: badarīphalamātram apy arhasi mamāpyāyanāya puroḍāśakhaṇḍaṃ dātum ity ukto bṛhaspatir uvāca
GP12vipce_pu:7437: yady evaṃ pūrvam eva tvayāhaṃ coditaḥ syāṃ tan mayā tvadarthaṃ kim akartavyam iti |
GP12vipce_pu:7438: svalpair evāhobhis tvāṃ nijaṃ padaṃ prāpayiṣyāmīty abhidhāya teṣām anudinābhicārikaṃ buddhimohāya śakrasya ca tejobhivṛddhaye juhāva |
GP12vipce_pu:7439: te cāpi tena buddhimohenābhibhūyamānā brahmadviṣo dharmatyāgino vedavādaparāṅmukhā babhūvuḥ tataś ca tān apetadharmācārān indro jaghāna |
GP12vipce_pu:7441: etad indrasya svapadacyāvanārohaṇaṃ śrutvā puruṣaḥ svapadabhraṃśaṃ daurātmyaṃ ca nāpnoti || rambhas tv anapatyo 'bhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7443: tatputraḥ saṃjayas tasyāpi jayas tataś ca vijayas tasmāc ca jajñe kṛtaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7444_0: tasya harṣavardhano harṣavardhanasutaḥ sahadevas tasmād adīnas tasya jayatsenaḥ tataś ca saṃkṛtis tatputraḥ kṣatradharmā
GP12vipce_pu:7444_1: ity ete kṣatravṛddhasyāto nahuṣavaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmīti || ViP_4,9.14 [[iti śrīviṣṇupurāṇe caturthe 'ṃśe navamo 'dhyāyaḥ ]]
GP12vipce_pu:7446: yatiyayātisaṃyātyāyātiviyātikṛtisaṃjñā nahuṣasya ṣaṭ putrā mahābalaparākramā babhūvuḥ || ViP_4,10.1
GP12vipce_pu:7449: uśanasaś ca duhitaraṃ devayānīṃ śarmiṣṭhāṃ ca vārṣaparvaṇīm upayeme |
GP12vipce_pu:7451: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata |
GP12vipce_pu:7452: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī || ViP_4,10.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7453: kāvyaśāpāc cākālenaiva yayātir jarām avāpa || ViP_4,10.5 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7454: prasannaśukravacanāc ca svajarāṃ saṃkrāmayituṃ jyeṣṭhaputraṃ yadum uvāca
GP12vipce_pu:7455: tvanmātāmahaśāpād iyam akālenaiva jarā mām upasthitā |
GP12vipce_pu:7456: tām ahaṃ tasyaivānugrahād bhavataḥ saṃcārayāmy ekaṃ varṣasahasram atṛpto 'smi viṣayeṣu tvadvayasā viṣayān ahaṃ bhoktum icchāmi |
GP12vipce_pu:7457: nātra bhavatā pratyākhyānaṃ kartavyam ity uktaḥ sa naicchat tāṃ jarām ādātum |
GP12vipce_pu:7460: anantaraṃ ca durvasuṃ druhyum anuṃ ca pṛthivīpatir jarāgrahaṇārthaṃ svayauvanapradānāya cābhyarthayām āsa |
GP12vipce_pu:7461: tair apy ekaikaśyena pratyākhyātas tāñ chaśāpa || ViP_4,10.8 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7463: sa cātipravaṇamatiḥ praṇamya pitaraṃ sabahumānaṃ mahān prasādo 'yam
GP12vipce_pu:7464: asmākam ity udāram abhidhāya jarāṃ pratijagrāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7465: svakīyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ pitre dadau || ViP_4,10.9 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7466: so 'pi pauravaṃ yauvanam āsādya dharmāvirodhena yathākāmaṃ yathākālopapannaṃ yathotsāhaṃ viṣayāṃś cacāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7468: viśvācyā devayānyā ca sahopabhogaṃ bhuktvā kāmānām antam avāpsyāmīty anudinaṃ tanmanasko babhūva anudinaṃ copabhogataḥ kāmān atīvābhiramyān mene || ViP_4,10.12 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7470: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GP12vipce_pu:7472: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7473: ekasyāpi na paryāptaṃ tasmāt tṛṣṇāṃ parityajet // ViP_4,10.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7474: yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12vipce_pu:7475: samadṛṣṭes tadā puṃsaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ // ViP_4,10.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7476: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7477: tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ saṃtyajet prājñaḥ sukhenaivābhipūryate // ViP_4,10.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:7478: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7479: dhanāśā jīvitāśā ca jīryato 'pi na jīryataḥ // ViP_4,10.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:7481: tathāpy anudinaṃ tṛṣṇā mamaiteṣv eva jāyate // ViP_4,10.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:7482: tasmād etām ahaṃ tyaktvā brahmaṇy ādhāya mānasam /
GP12vipce_pu:7483: nirdvandvo nirmamo bhūtvā cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha // ViP_4,10.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:7485: pūroḥ sakāśād ādāya jarāṃ dattvā ca yauvanam /
GP12vipce_pu:7486: rājye 'bhiṣicya pūruṃ ca prayayau tapase vanam // ViP_4,10.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:7488: pratīcyāṃ ca tathā druhyuṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ tato yadum // ViP_4,10.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:7489: udīcyāṃ ca tathaivānuṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalino nṛpān /
GP12vipce_pu:7490: sarvapṛthvīpatiṃ pūruṃ so 'bhiṣicya yayau vanam // ViP_4,10.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:7493: ataḥ paraṃ yayāteḥ prathamaputrasya yador vaṃśam ahaṃ kathayāmi |
GP12vipce_pu:7494_1: dharmārthakāmamokṣārthibhis tattatphalalābhāya sadābhiṣṭutāparicchedyamāhātmyenāṃśena bhagavān anādinidhano viṣṇur avatatāra ||
GP12vipce_pu:7496: yador vaṃśaṃ naraḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate |
GP12vipce_pu:7497: yatrāvatīrṇaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma nirākṛti || ViP_4,11.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7501: haihayaputro dharmas tasyāpi dharmanetras tataḥ kuntiḥ kunteḥ sāhaṃjit |
GP12vipce_pu:7503: tasmād bhadraśreṇyas tato durdamas tasmād dhanakaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7506: yo 'sau bhagavadaṃśam atrikulaprasūtaṃ dattātreyākhyam ārādhya bāhusahasram adharmasevānivāraṇaṃ dharmeṇa pṛthivījayaṃ dharmataś
GP12vipce_pu:7507: cānupālanam arātibhyo 'parājayam akhilajagatprakhyātapuruṣāc ca mṛtyum ity etān varān abhilaṣitavāṃl lebhe ca || ViP_4,11.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7511: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7512: yajñair dānais tapobhir vā praśrayeṇa śrutena ca // ViP_4,11.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:7514: evaṃ pañcāśītivarṣasahasrāṇy avyāhatārogyaśrībalaparākramo rājyam akarot || ViP_4,11.7
GP12vipce_pu:7518: tasya ca putraśatapradhānāḥ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7526: yato vṛṣṇisaṃjñām etad gotram avāpa || ViP_4,11.10 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7537: teṣāṃ ca pṛthuyaśāḥ pṛthukarmā pṛthujayaḥ pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthudānaḥ pṛthuśravāś ca ṣaṭ putrāḥ pradhānāḥ || ViP_4,12.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7539: tasmād uśanā yo vājimedhānāṃ śatam ājahāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7542: tataḥ parāvṛt parāvṛto rukmeṣupṛthujyāmaghapālitaharitasaṃjñās tasya pañcātmajā babhūvuḥ || atrāpy ayam adyāpi jyāmaghasya śloko gīyate |
GP12vipce_pu:7543: bhāryāvaśyās tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanty atha vā mṛtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7544: teṣāṃ tu jyāmaghaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaibyāpatir abhūn nṛpaḥ // ViP_4,12.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7545: aputrā tasya sā patnī śaibyā nāma tathāpy asau /
GP12vipce_pu:7546: apatyakāmo 'pi bhayān nānyāṃ bhāryām avindata // ViP_4,12.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7547: sa tv ekadā atiprabhūtagajaturagarathasaṃmardātidāruṇe mahāhave yudhyamānaḥ sakalam evārāticakram ajayat |
GP12vipce_pu:7548: tac cāricakram apāstaputrakalatrabandhubalakośaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ parityajya diśaḥ pravidrutam tasmiṃś ca vidrute 'titrāsalolāyatalocanayugalaṃ trāhi trāhi tātāmba
GP12vipce_pu:7549: bhrātar ity ākulavilāpavidhuraṃ rājakanyāratnam adrākṣīt || ViP_4,12.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7550: taddarśanāc ca tasyām anurāgānugatāntarātmā sa nṛpo 'cintayat |
GP12vipce_pu:7551: sādhv idaṃ mamāpatyavirahitasya vandhyābhartuḥ sāmprataṃ vidhināpatyakāraṇaṃ kanyāratnam upapāditam
GP12vipce_pu:7552: tad etat udvahāmy athaināṃ syandanam āropya svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ nayāmi ||
GP12vipce_pu:7553_0: tayaiva devyā śaibyayāham anujñātaḥ samudvakṣyāmīty athaināṃ ratham āropya svanagaram agacchat vijayinaṃ ca rājānam aśeṣapaurabhṛtyaparijanāmātyasamavetā
GP12vipce_pu:7554: sā cāvalokya rājñaḥ savyapārśvavartinīṃ kanyām īṣadudbhūtāmarṣasphuradadharapallavā rājānam avocat |
GP12vipce_pu:7555: aticapalacittātra syandane keyam āropitety asāv apy anālocitottaravacano
GP12vipce_pu:7556: 'tibhayāt tām āha snuṣā mameyam iti || ViP_4,12.11 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7558: nāhaṃ prasūtā putreṇa nānyā patny abhavat tava /
GP12vipce_pu:7559: snuṣāsaṃbandhatā hy eṣā katamena sutena te // ViP_4,12.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7562: yas te janiṣyaty ātmajas tasyeyam anāgata eva bhāryā nirūpitety ākarṇyodbhūtamṛduhāsā tathety āha praviveśa ca rājñā sahādhiṣṭhānam ||
GP12vipce_pu:7563: anantaraṃ cātiśuddhalagnahorāṃśakāvayavoktakṛtaputrajanmālāpaguṇād vayasaḥ pariṇāmam upagatāpi śaibyā svalpair evāhobhir garbham avāpa || ViP_4,12.14
GP12vipce_pu:7565: tasya ca vidarbha iti pitā nāma cakre |
GP12vipce_pu:7566: sa ca tāṃ snuṣām upayeme || ViP_4,12.15 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7570: dhṛteḥ kaiśikaḥ kaiśikasyāpi cediḥ putro 'bhūd yasya saṃtatau caidyā
GP12vipce_pu:7575: tasmād api jīmūtas tato vikṛtis tataś ca bhīmarathaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7576: tasmān navarathas tasyāpi daśarathas tataś ca śakunis tattanayaḥ karambhiḥ karambher devarāto 'bhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7577: tasyāpi devakṣatro devakṣatrān madhur madhor anavaratho 'navarathāt
GP12vipce_pu:7578: kuruvatsas tataś cānurathaḥ tataḥ puruhotro jajñe |
GP12vipce_pu:7579: tataś cāṃśus tataś ca satvataḥ satvatād ete sātvatāḥ ity etāṃ jyāmaghasaṃtatiṃ samyag chraddhāsamanvitaḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GP12vipce_pu:7583: bhajamānasya nimikṛkaṇavṛṣṇayas tathānye tadvaimātrāḥ śatajitsahasrajidayutajitsaṃjñāḥ devāvṛdhasyāpi babhruḥ putro 'bhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:7586: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ || ViP_4,13.3 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7587: puruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi cāṣṭa ca |
GP12vipce_pu:7588: ye 'mṛtatvam anuprāptā babhror devāvṛdhād api || ViP_4,13.4 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7589: mahābhojas tv atidharmātmā tasyānvaye bhojā mārtikāvatā babhūvuḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:7590: vṛṣṇeḥ sumitro yudhājic ca putrāv abhūtām |
GP12vipce_pu:7591: tataś cānamitraśinī tathānamitrān nighno nighnasya prasenasatrājitau |
GP12vipce_pu:7593: ekadā tv ambhonidhitīrasaṃśrayaḥ sūryaṃ satrājitas tuṣṭāva tanmanaskatayā ca bhāsvān abhiṣṭūyamāno 'gratas tasya tasthau |
GP12vipce_pu:7594: aspaṣṭamūrtidharaṃ cainam ālokya satrājitaḥ sūryam āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7595: yathaiva vyomni vahnipiṇḍopamam aham apaśyaṃ tathaivādyāgrato gatam apy atra na kiṃcid bhagavatā prasādīkṛtaṃ viśeṣam upalakṣayāmi ||
GP12vipce_pu:7596: ityevam ukte bhagavatā sūryeṇa nijakaṇṭhād unmucya syamantakanāmā mahāmaṇir avatāryaikānte nyastaḥ || ViP_4,13.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7597: tatas tam ātāmrojjvalahrasvavapuṣam īṣadāpiṅgalanayanam ādityam adrākṣīt |
GP12vipce_pu:7600: sa ca tad eva maṇiratnam ayācata |
GP12vipce_pu:7601: sa cāpi tasmai tad dattvā viyati svadhiṣṇyam āruroha || ViP_4,13.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7602: satrājito 'py amalamaṇiratnasanāthakaṇṭhatayā sūrya iva tejobhir aśeṣadigantarāṇy udbhāsayan dvārakāṃ viveśa || ViP_4,13.8 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7603: dvārakāvāsijanapadas tu tam āyāntam avekṣya bhagavantam ādipuruṣaṃ puruṣottamam avanibhārāvataraṇāyāṃśena mānuṣarūpadhāriṇaṃ praṇipatyāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7604: bhagavan bhagavantam ayaṃ nūnaṃ draṣṭum āyāty āditya ity ākarṇya prahasya ca tān āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7605: bhagavān nāyam ādityaḥ satrājito yam ādityadattaṃ syamanatakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇiṃ bibhrad atropayāti
GP12vipce_pu:7606: tad enaṃ visrabdhāḥ paśyata ity uktās te yayuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7607: sa ca taṃ syamantakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇim ātmaniveśane cakre || ViP_4,13.9 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7608: pratidinaṃ ca tan maṇiratnapravaram aṣṭau kanakabhārān sravati |
GP12vipce_pu:7610: acyuto 'pi tad ratnam ugrasenasya bhūpater yogyam etad iti lipsāṃ cakre |
GP12vipce_pu:7612: satrājito apy acyuto mām etad yācayiṣyatīty avagataratnalobhaḥ svabhrātre prasenāya tad ratnam dattavān |
GP12vipce_pu:7613: tac ca śucinā dhriyamāṇam aśeṣam eva suvarṇasrāvādikaṃ guṇam utpādayati |
GP12vipce_pu:7614: anyathā ya enaṃ dhārayati tam eva hantīty |
GP12vipce_pu:7615: asāv api prasenaḥ syamantakena kaṇṭhāsaktenāśvam āruhyāṭavyāṃ mṛgayām agacchat |
GP12vipce_pu:7617: sāśvaṃ ca taṃ nihatya siṃho 'py amalamaṇiratnam āsyāgreṇādāya gantum
GP12vipce_pu:7618: udyata ṛkṣādhipatinā jāmbavatā dṛṣṭo ghātitaś ca |
GP12vipce_pu:7619: jāmbavān apy amalaṃ tan maṇiratnam ādāya svabilaṃ praviveśa |
GP12vipce_pu:7620: sukumārasaṃjñāya ca bālakāya krīḍanakam akarot || ViP_4,13.12 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7621: anāgacchati ca tasmin prasene kṛṣṇo maṇiratnam abhilaṣitavān |
GP12vipce_pu:7622: na ca prāptavān nūnam etad asya karmety akhila eva yadulokaḥ parasparaṃ karṇākarṇy'kathayat viditalokāpavādavṛttāntaś ca bhagavān yadusainyaparivāraḥ prasenāśvapadavīm anusasāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7623: dadarśa cāśvasametaṃ prasenaṃ nihataṃ siṃhenākhilajanapadamadhye siṃhapadadarśanakṛtapariśuddhiḥ siṃhapadam anusasāra || ViP_4,13.14 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7624: ṛkṣavinihataṃ ca siṃham apy alpe bhūmibhāge dṛṣṭvā tataś ca tadratnagauravād ṛkṣasyāpi padāny anuyayau |
GP12vipce_pu:7625: giritaṭe ca sakalam eva yadusainyam avasthāpya tatpadānusārī ṛkṣabilaṃ praviveśa |
GP12vipce_pu:7626: ardhapraviṣṭaś ca dhātryāḥ sukumārakam ullāpayantyā vāṇīṃ śuśrāva |
GP12vipce_pu:7627: siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7628: sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ || ViP_4,13.15 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7629: ity ākarṇyalabdhasyamantakodantaḥ praviṣṭaḥ kumārakrīḍanakīkṛtaṃ ca dhātryā haste tejobhir jājvalyamānaṃ syamantakaṃ dadarśa || ViP_4,13.16 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7630: taṃ ca syamantakābhilāṣicakṣuṣam apūrvapuruṣam āgataṃ samavekṣya dhātrī trāhi trāhīti vyājahāra tadārtanādaśravaṇānantaraṃ cāmarṣapūrṇahṛdayaḥ sa jāmbavān ājagāma |
GP12vipce_pu:7631: tayoś ca parasparam yudhyator dvayor yuddham ekaviṃśatidināny abhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7632: te ca yadusainikās tatra saptāṣṭa dināni tanniṣkrāntim udīkṣamāṇās tasthuḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7633: aniṣkramamāṇe ca madhuripāv asāv avaśyam atra bile 'tyantaṃ nāśam āpto bhaviṣyaty anyathā tasya jīvataḥ katham etāvanti dināni śatrujaye vyākṣepo
GP12vipce_pu:7634: bhavatīti kṛtādhyavasāyā dvārakām āgatya hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti kathayām āsuḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:7635: tadbāndhavāś ca tatkālocitam akhilam uparatakriyākalāpaṃ cakruḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7638: nirjitaś ca bhagavatā jāmbavān praṇipatyāha V vyājahāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7639: asurasurayakṣagandharvarākṣasādibhir apy akhilair bhagavān na jetuṃ śakyaḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7640: kim utāvanigocarair alpavīryair narair narāvayavabhūtaiś ca tiryagyonyanusṛtibhiḥ kiṃ punar asmadvidhaiḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7641: avaśyaṃ bhagavato 'smatsvāmino nārāyaṇasya sakalajagatparāyaṇasyāṃśena bhagavatā bhavitavyam ity uktas tasmai bhagavān akhilāvanibhārāvatāram ācacakṣe |
GP12vipce_pu:7643: sa ca praṇipatyainaṃ punar api prasādya jāmbavatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ gṛhāgamanārghyabhūtāṃ grāhayām āsa || ViP_4,13.21 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7644: syamantakamaṇim apy asau praṇipatya tasmai pradadau |
GP12vipce_pu:7645: acyuto 'py atipraṇatāt tasmād agrāhyam api tan maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya jagrāha || ViP_4,13.22
GP12vipce_pu:7647: bhagavadāgamanodbhūtaharṣotkarṣasya dvārakāvāsijanasya kṛṣṇāvalokanāt tatkṣaṇam evātipariṇatavayaso 'pi navayauvanam ivābhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7648: ānakadundubhiṃ ca diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti sakalayādavāḥ striyaś ca sabhājayām āsuḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7649: bhagavān api yathānubhūtam aśeṣayādavasamāje yathāvad ācacakṣe |
GP12vipce_pu:7650: syamantakaṃ ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyābhiśastiviśuddhim avāpa ||
GP12vipce_pu:7652: satrājito 'pi mayāsyābhūtamalinam āropitam iti jātasaṃtrāsaḥ svasutāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavate bhāryāṃ dadau |
GP12vipce_pu:7653: tāṃ cākrūrakṛtavarmaśatadhanvapramukhā yādavāḥ pūrvaṃ varayāṃ āsuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7654: tatas tatpradānād avajñātam ivātmānaṃ manyamānāḥ satrājite vairānubandhaṃ cakruḥ || ViP_4,13.24
GP12vipce_pu:7656: ayam atidurātmā satrājito yo 'smābhir bhavatā ca abhyarthito 'py ātmajām asmān bhavantaṃ cāvigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān |
GP12vipce_pu:7657: tad alam anena jīvatā ghātayitvainaṃ tan mahāratnaṃ tvayā kiṃ na gṛhyate |
GP12vipce_pu:7658: vayam abhyupapatsyāmo yady acyutas tavopari vairānubandhaṃ kariṣyatīti ||
GP12vipce_pu:7659: evam uktas tathety asāv apy āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7660: jatugṛhadagdhānāṃ pāṇḍutanayānāṃ viditaparamārtho 'pi bhagavān duryodhanaprayatnaśaithilyakaraṇārtham ānukūlyakaraṇāya vāraṇāvataṃ gataḥ || ViP_4,13.26 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7661: gate ca tasmin suptam eva satrājitaṃ śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇiratnaṃ cādade
GP12vipce_pu:7662: pitṛvadhāmarṣapūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghraṃ syandanam ārūḍhā vāraṇāvataṃ gatvā bhagavate 'haṃ pratipāditety akṣāntimatā śatadhanvanāsmatpitā
GP12vipce_pu:7666: tad ālocya yad atra yuktaṃ tat kriyatām iti kṛṣṇam āha || ViP_4,13.27 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7667: tayā caivam uktaḥ parituṣṭāntaḥkaraṇo 'pi kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām amarṣatāmralocanaḥ prāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7670: na hy anullaṅghya varapādapaṃ tatkṛtanīḍāśrayiṇo vihaṃgā vadhyante |
GP12vipce_pu:7671: tad alam atyartham amunāsmatpurataḥ śokapreritavākyaparikareṇety uktvā dvārakām abhyetya baladevam ekānte vāsudevaḥ prāha |
GP12vipce_pu:7674: tadubhayavināśāt tan maṇiratnam āvābhyāṃ sāmānyaṃ bhaviṣyati ||
GP12vipce_pu:7675: tad uttiṣṭhāruhyatāṃ rathaḥ śatadhanvanidhanāyodyamaṃ kurv ity abhihitas tatheti samanvicchitavān
GP12vipce_pu:7676: kṛtodyogau ca tāv ubhāv upalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam upetya pārṣṇipūraṇakarmanimittam acodayat |
GP12vipce_pu:7678: nāhaṃ balabhadravāsudevābhyāṃ saha virodhāyālam ity uktaś cākrūram acodayat |
GP12vipce_pu:7680_0: na hi kaścid bhagavatā pādaprahāraparikampitajagattrayeṇāsurapuravanitāvaidhavyakāriṇā prabalaripucakrāpratihatacakreṇa cakriṇā
GP12vipce_pu:7681: amaravarāṇām api yoddhuṃ samarthaḥ kim utāhaṃ tadanyataḥ śaraṇam abhilaṣyatām || ViP_4,13.29
GP12vipce_pu:7683: yady asmatparitrāṇāsamarthaṃ bhavān ātmānam avagacchati tad ayam asmanmaṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatām ityuktaḥ so 'py āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7684: yady antāyām apy avasthāyāṃ na kasmaicid bhavān kathayiṣyati tad aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmīti |
GP12vipce_pu:7685: tathety ukte cākrūras tan maṇiratnaṃ jagrāha || ViP_4,13.30 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7687_0: śaibyasugrīvameghapuṣpabalāhakāśvacatuṣṭayayuktarathāvasthitau baladevavāsudevau tam anuprayātau sā ca vaḍavā śatayojanapramāṇamārgam
GP12vipce_pu:7687_1: atītya punar api vāhyamānā mithilāvanoddeśe prāṇān utsasarja
GP12vipce_pu:7688: śatadhanvāpi tāṃ parityajya padātir evādravat || ViP_4,13.32 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7690: tāvad atraiva syandane bhavatā stheyam aham enam adhamācāraṃ padātinam anugamya yāvad ghātayāmi
GP12vipce_pu:7692: naite 'śvā bhavatemaṃ bhūmibhāgam ullaṅghya neyāḥ || ViP_4,13.33 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7693: tathety uktvā balabhadro ratha eva tasthau |
GP12vipce_pu:7694: kṛṣṇo 'pi dvikrośamātraṃ bhūmibhāgam anusṛtya dūrasthitasyaiva cakraṃ kṣiptvā śatadhanvanaḥ śiraś ciccheda |
GP12vipce_pu:7695: taccharīrāmbarādiṣu ca bahuprakāram anviṣyann api syamantakaṃ maṇiṃ nāvāpa yadā tadopagamya balabhadram āha |
GP12vipce_pu:7699: dhik tvāṃ yas tvam evam arthalipsur etac ca te bhrātṛtvān marṣaye |
GP12vipce_pu:7701: na me dvārakayā na bandhubhiḥ kāryam alam ebhir mamāgrato 'līkaśapathair
GP12vipce_pu:7702: ity ākṣipya taṃ kathaṃcit prasādyamāno 'pi na tasthau |
GP12vipce_pu:7704: janakaś cārghyapūrvakam enaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa |

GP12vipce_pu:7708: varṣatrayānte ca babhrūgrasenaprabhṛtibhir yādavair na tad ratnaṃ kṛṣṇenāpahṛtam iti kṛtāvagatibhir videhapurīṃ gatvā baladevaḥ saṃpratyāyya dvārakām ānītaḥ || ViP_4,13.35 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7710: savanagatau hi kṣatriyavaiśyau nighnan brahmahā bhavatīty ato dīkṣākavacaṃ praviṣṭa eva tasthau

GP12vipce_pu:7712: athākrūrapakṣīyair bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ sahākrūro dvārakām apahāyāpakrāntaḥ || ViP_4,13.37 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7715: kim yad idam ekadaiva pracuropadravāgamanam etad ālocyatām || ViP_4,13.38
GP12vipce_pu:7717: asyākrūrasya pitā śvaphalko yatra yatrābhūt tatra tatra durbhikṣamarakānāvṛṣtyādikaṃ nābhūt kāśīrājasya viṣaye 'tyantānāvṛṣṭyāṃ śvaphalko 'nīyata |

GP12vipce_pu:7723: putri kasmān na jāyase niṣkramyatām āsyaṃ te draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ svakāṃ ca mātaraṃ kim iti ciraṃ kleśayiṣyasīty ukte garbhasthaiva vyājahāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7724: tāta yady ekaikāṃ gāṃ dine dine brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchasi tad aham anyais tribhir varṣair asmād garbhād avaśyaṃ niṣkramiṣyāmīti |
GP12vipce_pu:7725: etac ca tadvacanam ākarṇya rājā dine dine brāhmaṇāya gāṃ prādāt |
GP12vipce_pu:7727: tatas tasyāḥ pitā gāndinīti nāma cakāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7728: tāṃ ca gāndinīṃ kanyāṃ śvaphalkāya priyopakāriṇe gṛhāgatāyārghabhūtāṃ prādāt || ViP_4,13.41
GP12vipce_pu:7731: katham asminn apakrānte marakadurbhikṣādyupadravā na bhaviṣyanti |

GP12vipce_pu:7733: yaduvṛddhasyāndhakasyaitad vacanam ākarṇya keśavograsenabalabhadrapurogamair yadubhiḥ kṛtāparādhatitikṣābhavam abhayaṃ dattvā śvāphalkiḥ svapuram ānītaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7734: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya tatsthasya maṇer anubhāvad anāvṛṣṭimarakadurbhikṣavyālādyupadravaḥ śaśāma |
GP12vipce_pu:7736: svalpam etat kāraṇaṃ yad ayaṃ gāndinyāṃ śvaphalkenākrūro jātaḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:7744: dānapate jānīma eva vayaṃ yathā śatadhanvanā tad akhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ bhavataḥ samarpitaṃ tad etad rāṣṭropakārakaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhatīti |

GP12vipce_pu:7748_0: kim atrānuṣṭheyam anyathā ced bravīmy ahaṃ tat kevalāmbaratirodhānam anviṣyanto ratnam etad drakṣyantīty anveṣaṇaṃ na kṣemam
GP12vipce_pu:7748_1: iti saṃcintya tam akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ nārāyaṇam āhākrūraḥ bhagavan mamaitat syamantakaratnaṃ śatadhanvanā samarpitam ||
GP12vipce_pu:7749: apagate ca tasminn adya śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhagavān māṃ yācayiṣyatīti etāvantaṃ kālam atikṛcchreṇādhārayam
GP12vipce_pu:7750: tasya ca dhāraṇakleśenāham aśeṣopabhogeṣv asaṅgimānaso na vedmi svasukhakalām api || ViP_4,13.49
GP12vipce_pu:7751: etāvanmātram apy aśeṣarāṣṭropakārī dhārayituṃ na śaknotīti māṃ bhavān maṃsyata ity ātmanā na coditam || ViP_4,13.50 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7752: tad idaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ gṛhyatām icchayā yasyābhimataṃ tasya samarpyatām |
GP12vipce_pu:7754: tataś ca niṣkrāmya syamantakamaṇiṃ tasmin yadusamāje mumoca |

GP12vipce_pu:7757: sa eṣa maṇir yaḥ śatadhanvanāsmākaṃ samarpito yasyāyaṃ sa enaṃ gṛhṇātv iti |

GP12vipce_pu:7760: mamedaṃ pitṛdhanam ity atīva ca satyabhāmā spṛhāṃ cakāra |

GP12vipce_pu:7765: etat sarvakālaṃ śucinā brahmacaryeṇa dhriyamāṇam aśeṣarāṣṭrasyopakārakam aśucinā dhriyamāṇam ādhāram eva hanti || ViP_4,13.55 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7769: tad ayaṃ yaduloko 'haṃ balabhadraḥ satyā ca tvāṃ dānapate prārthayāmaḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:7774: ity etāṃ bhagavato mithyābhiśastikṣālanāṃ yaḥ smarati na tasya kadācid alpāpi mithyābhiśastir bhavati |

GP12vipce_pu:7797: tāś ca sarvā eva vasudeva upayeme |

GP12vipce_pu:7809: pṛthā śrutadevā śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravā rājādhidevī ca vasudevādīnāṃ pañca bhaginyo 'bhavan śūrasya kuntir nāma sakhābhavat |

GP12vipce_pu:7825: punar apy akṣatavīryaśauryasaṃpatparākramaguṇaḥ samākrāntasakalatrailokyeśvarapratāpo daśānano 'bhavat || ViP_4,14.11 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7829: śiśupālatve 'pi bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāyāvatīrṇāṃśasya puṇḍarīkanayanākhyasyopari dveṣānubandham atitarāñ cakāra |
GP12vipce_pu:7830: bhagavatā ca nidhanam upanītas tatraiva paramātmabhūte manasas tadekāgratayā tatraiva sāyujyam avāpa || ViP_4,14.13 ||

GP12vipce_pu:7866_0: tatprasādavivardhitamānābhimānā ca yoganidrā nandagopapatnyā yaśodāyā garbham adhiṣṭhitavatī suprasannādityacandrādigraham
