GP12vipce_pu:7926: tataś campo yaś campāṃ niveśayām āsa |
GP12vipce_pu:7927: campasya haryaṅgas tato bhadrarathas tato bṛhadrathas tato bṛhatkarmā bṛhatkarmaṇaś ca bṛhadbhānus tasmād bṛhanmanās tato jayadrathaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7928: jayadratho brahmakṣatrāntarālasaṃbhūtyāṃ patnyāṃ vijayaṃ nāma putram ajījanat || ViP_4,18.4
GP12vipce_pu:7932: yo 'sau gaṅgāṃ gato mañjūṣāgataṃ pṛthāpaviddhaṃ karṇaṃ putram avāpa |
GP12vipce_pu:7934: ataś ca puror vaṃśaṃ śrotum arhasīti || ViP_4,18.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7937: pūror janamejayaḥ putras tasyāpi pracinvān pracinvataḥ pravīraḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7938: tasmān manasyur manasyoś cābhayadas tasyāpi sudyuḥ sudyor bahugavaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7939: tasyāpi saṃyātiḥ saṃyāter ahaṃyātiḥ tato raudrāśvaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7940: ṛteyuḥ kakṣeyuḥ sthaṇḍileyur dhṛteyur jaleyuḥ sthaleyur dharmeyuḥ saṃnateyur dhaneyur vaneyur nāmāno raudrāśvasya daśātmajā V putrā babhūvuḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7942: sumatim apratirathaṃ dhruvaṃ ca rantināraḥ putrān avāpa |
GP12vipce_pu:7947: duṣyantāc cakravartī bharato 'bhavat yannāmahetur devaiḥ śloko gīyate |
GP12vipce_pu:7948: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7949: bharasva putraṃ duṣyanta māvamaṃsthāḥ śakuntalām || ViP_4,19.1 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7951: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyam āha śakuntalā || ViP_4,19.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7953: naite mamānurūpā ity abhihitās tanmātaro jaghnuḥ parityāgabhayāt |
GP12vipce_pu:7954: tato 'sya vitathe putrajanmani putrārthino marutsomayājino dīrghatamasā pārṣṇyapāstabṛhaspativīryād utathyapatnīmamatāsamutpanno bharadvājākhyaḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7957: mūḍhe bhara dvājam imaṃ bhara dvājaṃ bṛhaspate |
GP12vipce_pu:7958: yātau yad uktvā pitarau bharadvājas tatas tv ayam || ViP_4,19.5 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7959: iti bharadvājaś ca tasya vitathe putrajanmani marudbhir dattas tato vitathasaṃjñām avāpa || vitathasya bhavan manyuḥ putro 'bhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:7962: gargāc chinis tato gārgyāḥ śainyāḥ kṣatropetā dvijātayo babhūvuḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:7964: tasya trayyāruṇapuṣkariṇau kapiś ca putratrayam abhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:7965: tac ca tritayam api paścād vipratām upajagāma |
GP12vipce_pu:7966: bṛhatkṣatrasya suhotraḥ suhotrād dhastī ya idaṃ hastināpuram āropayām āsa
GP12vipce_pu:7971: tato bṛhaddhanus tataś ca bṛhatkarmā tasmāj jayadrathas tato 'pi viśvajit
GP12vipce_pu:7979: pārāt pṛthuḥ pṛthoḥ sukṛtiḥ sukṛter vibhrājaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7980: tataś cāṇuho yaḥ śukaduhitaraṃ kṛtvīṃ nāmopayeme || ViP_4,19.10 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7984: dvimīḍhasya tu yavīnarasaṃjñas tasyāpi dhṛtimāṃs tataḥ satyadhṛtis tataś ca dṛḍhanemiḥ tasmāc ca supārśvas tataḥ sumatis tataś ca sannatimān sannatimataḥ kṛto
GP12vipce_pu:7987: yaś caturviṃśati prācyasāmagānāṃ saṃhitāś cakāra || ViP_4,19.11 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7988: kṛtāc cogrāyudho yena prācuryeṇa nīpakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ || ViP_4,19.12 ||
GP12vipce_pu:7989: ugrāyudhāt kṣemyaḥ kṣemyāt suvīras tasmād ripuṃjayas tasmāc ca bahuratha ity ete pauravāḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7990: ajamīḍhasya nalinī nāma patnī tasyāṃ nīlasaṃjñaḥ putro 'bhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:7991: tasmād api śāntiḥ śānteḥ suśāntiḥ suśānteḥ purujānuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7994: pañcānām eteṣāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāyālam ete matputrā iti pitrābhihitam |
GP12vipce_pu:7996: mudgalāc ca maudgalyāḥ kṣatropetā dvijātayo babhūvuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:7997: mudgalād vadhyaśvo vadhyaśvād divodāso 'halyā ca mithunam abhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:8000: satyadhṛtes tu varāpsarasam urvaśīṃ dṛṣṭvā retaḥ skannaṃ śarastambe papāta
GP12vipce_pu:8001: tac ca dvidhā gatam apatyadvayaṃ kumāraḥ kanyakā cābhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:8002: mṛgayām upagataḥ śāntanur dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā jagrāha || ViP_4,19.15 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8003: tataḥ sa kumāraḥ kṛpaḥ kanyā cāśvatthāmno jananī kṛpī droṇasya patny abhavat |
GP12vipce_pu:8004: divodāsasyāpi mitrāyuḥ putro mitrāyoś cyavano nāma rājā cyavanāt sudāsaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8007: teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣataḥ pṛṣatād drupadas tasmād dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato dhṛṣṭaketuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8010: ya idaṃ dharmakṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ cakāra || ViP_4,19.16 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8012: sudhanuṣaḥ putraḥ suhotraḥ tasmāc cyavanaś cyavanāt kṛtakaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8015: bṛhadrathāt kuśāgras tasmād ṛṣabhas tataḥ puṣpavān |
GP12vipce_pu:8016: tasmāt satyahitas tasmāt sudhanvā tasya ca jantuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8017: bṛhadrathāc cānyaḥ śakaladvayajanmā jarayā saṃdhito jarāsaṃdhanāmā |
GP12vipce_pu:8018: tasmāt sahadevas tataḥ somapis tataḥ śrutaśravāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8023: jahnos tu suratho nāmātmajo babhūva || ViP_4,20.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8025: vidūrathasya sārvabhaumaḥ sārvabhaumāj jayatsenas tasmād ārādhitas tataś cāyutāyur ayutāyor akrodhanaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8033: ayaṃ ca tasya ślokaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gīyate |
GP12vipce_pu:8034: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ yauvanam eti saḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8035: śāntiṃ cāpnoti yenāgryāṃ karmaṇā tena śāṃtanuḥ // ViP_4,20.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:8036: tasya śāṃtano rāṣṭre dvādaśavarṣāṇi devo na vavarṣa || ViP_4,20.6 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8037: tataś cāśeṣarāṣṭravināśam avekṣyāsau rājā brāhmaṇān apṛcchat |
GP12vipce_pu:8038: kasmād asmadrāṣṭre devo na varṣati ko mamāparādha iti |
GP12vipce_pu:8040: agrajasya te 'rheyam avanis tvayā bhujyate parivettā tvam ity uktaḥ sa punas tān apṛcchat
GP12vipce_pu:8043: yāvad devāpir na patanādibhir doṣair abhibhūyate tāvat tasyārhaṃ rājyam |
GP12vipce_pu:8044: tad alam etena tasmai dīyatām ity ukte tasya mantripravareṇāśmasāriṇātatrāraṇye tapasvino vedavādavirodhavaktāraḥ prayuktāḥ || ViP_4,20.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8045: tair asyātiṛjumater mahīpatiputrasya buddhir vedavirodhamārgānusāriṇy akriyata || ViP_4,20.8
GP12vipce_pu:8046: rājā ca śāṃtanur dvijavacanotpannaparivedanaśokas tān brāhmaṇān agraṇīkṛtyāgrajarājyapradānāyāraṇyaṃ jagāma |
GP12vipce_pu:8047: tadāśramam upagatāś ca tam avanīpatiputraṃ devāpim upatasthuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8048: te brāhmaṇā vedavādānubaddhāni vacāṃsi rājyam agrajena kartavyam ity arthavanti tam ūcuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8049: asāv api devāpir vedavādavirodhiyuktidūṣitam anekaprakāraṃ tān āha |
GP12vipce_pu:8051: āgaccha bho rājann alam atrātinirbandhena praśānta evāsāv anāvṛṣṭidoṣaḥ patito 'yam anādikālam ahitavedavacanadūṣaṇoccāraṇāt |
GP12vipce_pu:8052: patite cāgraje naiva pārivedyaṃ bhavatīty uktaḥ śāṃtanuḥ svapuram āgatya rājyam akarot |
GP12vipce_pu:8053: vedavādavirodhivacanoccāraṇadūṣite ca tasmin devāpāv akhilasya niṣpattaye vavarṣa bhagavān parjanyaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8056: śāṃtanor apy amaranadyāṃ gaṅgāyām udārakīrtir aśeṣaśāstrārthavid bhīṣmaḥ putro 'bhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:8057: satyavatyāṃ ca citrāṅgadavicitravīryau putrāv utpādayām āsa śāṃtanuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8058: citrāṅgadas tu bāla eva citrāṅgadena gandharveṇāhave vinihataḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8060: tadupabhogātikhedāc ca yakṣmaṇā gṛhītaḥ pañcatvam agamat |
GP12vipce_pu:8061: satyavatīniyogāc ca tatputraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano mātur vacanam anatikramaṇīyam iti vicitravīryakṣetre dhṛtarāṣṭrapāṇḍū tatprahitabhujiṣyāyāṃ ca viduraṃ utpādayām āsa || ViP_4,20.10 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8063: pāṇḍor apy araṇye mṛgaśāpopahataprajananasāmarthyasya dharmavāyuśakrair yudhiṣṭhirabhīmārjunāḥ kuntyāṃ nakulasahadevau cāśvibhyāṃ mādryāṃ pañca putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8064: teṣāṃ ca draupadyāṃ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8065: yudhiṣṭhirāt prativindhyo bhīmasenāc chrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtir arjunāc chatānīko nakulāc chrutakarmā sahadevāt |
GP12vipce_pu:8066: apare ca pāṇḍavānām ātmajās tad yathā |
GP12vipce_pu:8069: kāśī ca bhīmasenād eva sarvatragaṃ putram avāpa |
GP12vipce_pu:8070: sahadevāc ca vijayā suhotraṃ nāma putraṃ prāptavatī |
GP12vipce_pu:8071: kareṇumatyāṃ ca nakulo 'pi niramitram ajījanat || ViP_4,20.11 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8072: arjunasyāpy ulūpyāṃ nāgakanyāyām irāvān nāma putro 'bhūt |
GP12vipce_pu:8073: maṇipurapatiputryāṃ ca putrikādharmeṇa babhruvāhanaṃ nāma putram arjuno
GP12vipce_pu:8075: subhadrāyāṃ cārbhakatve 'pi yo 'sāv atibalaparākramasamastārātirathavijetā so 'bhimanyur ajāyata
GP12vipce_pu:8076_0: abhimanyor uttarāyāṃ parikṣīṇeṣu kuruṣv aśvatthāmaprayuktabrahmāstreṇa garbha eva bhasmīkṛto bhagavataḥ sakalasurāsuravanditacaraṇayugalasyātmecchākāraṇamānuṣarūpadhāriṇo
GP12vipce_pu:8077: yo 'yaṃ sāmpratam etad bhūmaṇḍalam akhaṇḍitāyatidharmeṇa pālayati|420.13
GP12vipce_pu:8080: ataḥ paraṃ bhaviṣyān ahaṃ bhūpālān kīrtayiṣyāmi |
GP12vipce_pu:8081: yo 'yaṃ sāmpratam avanīpatiḥ parīkṣit tasyāpi janamejayaśrutasenograsenabhīmasenāḥ putrāś catvāro bhaviṣyanti ||
GP12vipce_pu:8083: yo 'sau yājñavalkyād vedam adhītya kṛpād astrāṇy avāpya
GP12vipce_pu:8084: viṣayaviraktacittavṛttiś ca śaunakopadeśād ātmavijñānapravīṇaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇam āpsyati || ViP_4,21.2
GP12vipce_pu:8089: uṣṇāc citrarathas tataḥ śucirathas tasmād vṛṣṇimāṃs tataḥ suṣeṇaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8090: tasmād api sunīthaḥ sunīthād ṛcas tato nṛcakṣus tasyāpi sukhibalas tasmād pariplavas tataś ca sunayas tato medhāvī |
GP12vipce_pu:8091: tato n.paṃjayas tato mṛdus tasmāt tigmas tigmād bṛhadrathaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8093: tasmāc codayana udayanād ahīnaras tataś ca daṇḍapāṇis tato niramitras tasmāc ca kṣemakaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8096: kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ sa saṃsthāṃ prāpsyate kalau // ViP_4,21.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8101: tasmād urukṣayas tato vatso vatsād vatsavyūhaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8102: tataḥ prativyomas tasyāpi divākaras tasmāt sahadevaḥ || ViP_4,22.2 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8103: tato bṛhadaśvas tatsūnur bhānurathas tasya pratītāśvas tasyāpi supratīkaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8104: tato marudevo marudevāt sunakṣatras tasmāt kiṃnaraḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8105: kiṃnara-d antarikṣas tasmāt suvarṇas tataś cāmitrajit |
GP12vipce_pu:8106: tataś ca bṛhadrājas tasyāpi dharmī dharmiṇaḥ kṛtaṃjayaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8107: kṛtaṃjayād raṇaṃjayo raṇaṃjayāt saṃjayas tasmāc chākyaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8108: śākyāc chuddhodanas tasmād rāhulas tataḥ prasenajit |
GP12vipce_pu:8109: tataś ca kṣudrakas tataś ca kuṇḍakas tasmād api surathaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8110: tatputraś ca sumitro 'ntya ity ete cekṣvākavo bṛhadbalānvayāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8113: yatas taṃ prāpya rājānaṃ sa saṃsthāṃ prāpsyate kalau // ViP_4,22.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8117: atra hi vaṃśe mahābalā jarāsaṃdhapradhānā babhūvuḥ || ViP_4,23.1 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8118: jarāsaṃdhasutāt sahadevāt somāpis tasmāc chṛtavāṃs tasyāpy ayutāyus tataś ca niramitras tattanayaḥ sukṣatras tasmād api bṛhatkarmā |
GP12vipce_pu:8119: tataś ca senajit tasmāc ca śrutaṃjayas tato vipras tasya putraḥ śucināmā bhaviṣyati |
GP12vipce_pu:8120: tasyāpi kṣemyas tataś ca suvrataḥ suvratād dharmas tataḥ suśramaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8121: tato dṛḍhasenas tataḥ sumatis tasmāt subalas tasya sunīto bhavitā |
GP12vipce_pu:8122: tataḥ satyajit satyajito viśvajit tasyāpi ripuṃjayaḥ putraḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8123: ity ete bārhadrathā bhūpatayo varṣasahasram ekaṃ bhaviṣyantīti ||
GP12vipce_pu:8126: yo 'yaṃ ripuṃjayo nāma bārhadratho 'ntyas tasya muniko nāmāmātyo
GP12vipce_pu:8128: sa cainaṃ svāminaṃ hatvā svaputraṃ pradyotanāmānam abhiṣekṣyati |
GP12vipce_pu:8130: tataś ca viśākhayūpas tatputro janakas tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8131: ity ete 'ṣṭatriṃśaduttaram abdaśataṃ pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti || ViP_4,24.1
GP12vipce_pu:8132: tataś ca śiśunāgas tatputraś ca kākavarṇo bhavitā |
GP12vipce_pu:8137: ity ete śaiśunāgā daśa bhūmipālās trīṇi varṣaśatāni dviṣaṣṭyadhikāni bhaviṣyanti || ViP_4,24.2
GP12vipce_pu:8141: sa caikacchatrām anullaṅghitaśāsano mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyati ||
GP12vipce_pu:8144: mahāpadmas tatputrāś ca ekaṃ varṣaśatam avanīpatayo bhaviṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8145: navaitān nandān kauṭilyo brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati || ViP_4,24.5 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8149: tasyāpy aśokavardhanas tataḥ suyaśās tato daśarathas tataḥ saṃgatas tataḥ śāliśūkas tasmāt somaśarmā tasmāc chatadhanvā |
GP12vipce_pu:8151: evaṃ mauryā daśa bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti abdaśataṃ saptatriṃśaduttaram |
GP12vipce_pu:8152: teṣām ante pṛthivīṃ śuṅgā bhokṣyanti || ViP_4,24.7 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8153: puṣyamitraḥ senāpatiḥ svāminaṃ hatvā rājyaṃ kariṣyati || ViP_4,24.8 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8154: asyātmajo 'gnimitras tasmāt sujyeṣṭhas tato vasumitras tasmād apy ardrakas tataḥ pulindakas tato ghoṣavasus tasmād api vajramitras tato bhāgavataḥ ||
GP12vipce_pu:8156: ity ete daśa śuṅgā dvādaśottaraṃ varṣaśataṃ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8157: tataḥ kaṇvān eṣā bhūr yāsyati || ViP_4,24.10 ||
GP12vipce_pu:8158: devabhūtiṃ tu śuṅgarājānaṃ vyasaninaṃ tasyaivāmātyaḥ kaṇvo vasudevanāmā nipātya svayam avanīṃ bhokṣyate |
GP12vipce_pu:8161: ete kāṇvāyanāś catvāraḥ pañcacatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8162: suśarmāṇaṃ tu kāṇvaṃ svabhṛtyo balāt śiprakanāmā hatvāndhrajātīyo vasudhāṃ bhokṣyati |
GP12vipce_pu:8163: tataś ca kṛṣṇanāmā tadbhrātā bhūpatir bhāvī |
GP12vipce_pu:8164: tasya putraḥ śrīśātakarṇis tasyāpi pūrṇotsaṅgas tatputraś ca śātakarṇis tasmāc ca lambodaras tasmād divīlakas tato meghasvātis tataḥ paṭumān |
GP12vipce_pu:8165: tataś cāriṣṭakarmā tato hālo hālāt pattalakas tataḥ pravilla senas tataḥ sundaraḥ śātakarṇī tasmāc cakoraḥ śātakarṇī tataḥ śivasvātis tataś ca gomatīputras tatputraḥ pulimān |
GP12vipce_pu:8166: tasyāpi śātakarṇī tataḥ śivaśrīs tataḥ śivaskandhaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8167: tasmād yajñaśrīs tato vijayas tataś candraśrīs tasyāpi pulomāviḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8168: evam ete triṃśac catvāry abdaśatāni ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikāni pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanty āndhrabhṛtyāḥ saptābhīrāḥ daśa gardabhilāś ca bhūbhujo bhaviṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8170: tataś cāṣṭau yavanāś caturdaśa tuṣārā muṇḍāś ca trayodaśa ekādaśa maunāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8172: tataś ca paurā ekādaśa bhūpatayo 'bdaśatāni trīṇi mahīṃ bhokṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8173: teṣūtsanneṣu kailakilā yavanā bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanty amūrdhābhiṣiktāḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8175: tataḥ puraṃjayas tato rāmacandras tasmād dharmo dharmād vaṅgaraḥ kṛtanandanaḥ suṣinandis tadbhrātā nandiyaśāḥ śiśukapravīrau caite varṣaśataṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti |
GP12vipce_pu:8176: tatas tatputrās trayodaśaite bāhlikāś ca trayaḥ |
GP12vipce_pu:8177: tataḥ puṣyamitrapaṭumitrās trayodaśa mekalāś ca saptāndhrāḥ |

GP12vipce_pu:8219: teṣāṃ ca bījabhūtānām aśeṣamanuṣyāṇāṃ pariṇatānām api tatkālakṛtānām apatyaprasūtir bhaviṣyati

GP12vipce_pu:12571: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /

GP12vipce_pu:12599: utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim /

GP12vipce_pu:12609: For 82, B2 subst.; while B1 ins. after 82
GP12vipce_pu:12610: bhūteṣu yo 'ntar vasati sma nityaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni ca yatra santi /

GP12vipce_pu:12668: prāyaścittaṃ sa cet pṛṣṭo vadiṣyati ripur mama /

GP12vipce_pu:12671: ity uktvā ratham āruhya kṛṣṇājinadharo nṛpaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:12673: tam āyāntaṃ samālokya khāṇḍikyo ripum ātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12677: kṛṣṇājinadhare vetsi na mayi prahariṣyati // ViP_6,6.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:12678: mṛgāṇāṃ vada pṛṣṭheṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim /
GP12vipce_pu:12679: yeṣāṃ mayā tvayā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ // ViP_6,6.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:12680: sa tvām ahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvan vimokṣyase /

GP12vipce_pu:12683: khāṇḍikya saṃśayaṃ praṣṭuṃ bhavantam aham āgataḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:12686: tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārdham ekānte sapurohitaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12687: mantrayām āsa khāṇḍikyaḥ sarvair eva mahāmatiḥ // ViP_6,6.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:12688: tam ūcur mantriṇo vadhyo ripur eṣa vaśaṃ gataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12689: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:12690: khāṇḍikyaś cāha tān sarvān evam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12691: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:12693: na hanmi cel lokajayo mama tv asya vasuṃdharā // ViP_6,6.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:12695: nāhaṃ manye lokajayād adhikā syād vasuṃdharā // ViP_6,6.29*11 //

GP12vipce_pu:12700: praṣṭavyaṃ yat tvayā sarvaṃ tat pṛcchasva vadāmy aham // ViP_6,6.31 //

GP12vipce_pu:12706: yāgabhūmim upāgamya cakre sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kramāt // ViP_6,6.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:12708: kṛtakṛtyas tato bhūtvā cintayām āsa pārthivaḥ // ViP_6,6.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:12709: pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:12711: yathārham atra lokasya mayā sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam /
GP12vipce_pu:12712: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetas tathāpi mama kiṃ yathā // ViP_6,6.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:12713: itthaṃ saṃcintayann eva sasmāra sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12714: khāṇḍikyāya na datteti mayā vai gurudakṣiṇā // ViP_6,6.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:12715: sa jagāma tato bhūyo ratham āruhya pārthivaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:12717: khāṇḍikyo 'pi punar dṛṣṭvā tam āyāntaṃ dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12718: tasthau hantuṃ kṛtamatis tam āha sa punar nṛpaḥ // ViP_6,6.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:12719: bho nāhaṃ te 'pakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12720: guror niṣkrayadānāya mām avehi tvam āgatam // ViP_6,6.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:12722: so 'haṃ te dātum icchāmi vṛṇuṣva gurudakṣiṇām // ViP_6,6.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:12724: bhūyaḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayām āsa pārthivaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12725: guruniṣkṛtikāmo 'tra kim ayaṃ prārthyatām iti // ViP_6,6.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:12726: tam ūcur mantriṇo rājyam aśeṣaṃ prārthyatām ayam /

GP12vipce_pu:12729: svalpakālaṃ mahīrājyaṃ mādṛśaiḥ prārthyate katham // ViP_6,6.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:12731: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ // ViP_6,6.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:12733: ity uktvā samupetyainaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam /

GP12vipce_pu:12735: bāḍham ity eva tenoktaḥ khāṇḍikyas tam athābravīt /
GP12vipce_pu:12737: yadi ced dīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12738: tat kleśapraśamāyālaṃ yat karma tad udīraya // ViP_6,6.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:12741: na prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmān mama rājyam akaṇṭakam /

GP12vipce_pu:12744: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12745: rājyam etad aśeṣaṃ te yatra gṛdhnanty apaṇḍitāḥ // ViP_6,7.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:12749: yat prajāpālanaṃ yac ca svarājyapratipakṣaṇām // ViP_6,7.3*12 //
GP12vipce_pu:12750: yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāsty apahṛte tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:12751: bandhāyaiva bhavaty eṣā avidyāpy akramojjhitā // ViP_6,7.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:12753: anyeṣāṃ doṣajā naiva dharmam evānurudhyate // ViP_6,7.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:12754: na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitat satāṃ matam // ViP_6,7.6ab //
GP12vipce_pu:12756: janmopabhogakṣayadaṃ yogād anyan na vidyate // ViP_6,7.6ab*13:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12759: ato na yācitaṃ rājyam avidyāntargataṃ tava // ViP_6,7.6cd //

GP12vipce_pu:13103: jñānaṃ jñeyam anantam ādirahitaṃ sarvāmarāṇāṃ hitaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayo
GP12vipce_pu:13105: yatrādau bhagavāṃś carācaragurur madhye tathānte ca sa brahmajñānamayo 'cyuto 'khilajaganmadhyāntasargaprabhuḥ
GP12vipce_pu:13106: tac chṛṇvan puruṣaḥ pavitraparamaṃ bhaktyā paṭhan dhārayan prāpnoty asti na tat samastabhuvaneṣv ekāntasiddhir hariḥ // ViP_6,8.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:13107: yasmin nyastamatir na yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yac cintane vighno yatra niveśitātmamanaso brāhmo 'pi loko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:13108: muktiṃ cetasi yaḥ sthito 'maladhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadāty avyayaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yad
GP12vipce_pu:13109: aghaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // ViP_6,8.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:13110: yajñair yajñavido yajanti satataṃ yajñeśvaraṃ karmiṇo yaṃ yaṃ brahmamayaṃ parāparaparaṃ dhyāyanti ca jñāninaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:13111: yaṃ saṃprāpya na jāyate na mriyate no vardhate hīyate naivāsan na ca sad bhavaty ati tataḥ kiṃ vā hareḥ śrūyatām // ViP_6,8.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:13112: kavyaṃ yaḥ pitṛrūpadhṛg vidhihutaṃ havyaṃ ca bhuṅkte vibhur devatve bhagavān anādinidhanaḥ svāhāsvadhāsaṃjñitaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:13113: yasmin brahmaṇi sarvaśaktinilaye mānāni no mānināṃ niṣṭhāyai prabhavanti hanti kaluṣaṃ śrotraṃ sa yāto hariḥ // ViP_6,8.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:13114: nānto 'sti yasya na ca yasya samudbhavo 'sti vṛddhir na yasya
GP12vipce_pu:13116: nāpakṣayaṃ ca samupaity avikalpavastu yas taṃ nato 'smi puruṣottamam īśam īḍyam // ViP_6,8.59
GP12vipce_pu:13117: tasyaiva yo 'nuguṇabhug bahudhaika eva śuddho 'py aśuddha iva mūrtivibhāgabhedaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:13118: jñānānvitaḥ sakalatattvavibhūtikartā tasmai nato 'smi puruṣāya sadāvyayāya // ViP_6,8.60
GP12vipce_pu:13123: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana /
GP12vipce_pu:13126: puṃsaḥ samastakaraṇair upakārakāya vyaktāya sūkṣmavimalāya sadā nato 'smi
GP12vipce_pu:13127: iti vividham ajasya yasya rūpaṃ prakṛtiparātmamayaṃ sanātanasya /
GP12vipce_pu:13128: pradiśatu bhagavān aśeṣapuṃsāṃ harir apajanmajarādikāṃ sa siddhim //
